soliton_automata.gui.main_window_ba

GUI of the software.

   1"""GUI of the software.
   2 """
   3import copy
   4import io
   5import math
   6import os
   7import re
   8import json
   9from json.decoder import JSONDecodeError
  10from datetime import datetime
  11
  12import networkx as nx
  13import soliton_automata.res.resources
  14from soliton_automata.gui.startscreen import Startscreen
  15from PIL.ImageQt import ImageQt
  16from PyQt5 import QtCore, QtGui, QtWidgets
  17from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt
  18from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QDialog, QMainWindow, QMessageBox, QScrollArea, QFrame
  19from soliton_automata.soliton_classes.multiwave_soliton_automata import MultiwaveSolitonAutomaton
  20from soliton_automata.soliton_classes.soliton_automata import SolitonAutomaton
  21from soliton_automata.soliton_classes.soliton_graph import SolitonGraph
  22from soliton_automata.soliton_classes.soliton_path import SolitonPath
  23from soliton_automata.soliton_classes.traversal import Traversal
  24from soliton_automata.visualisations.animation import Animation
  25from soliton_automata.visualisations.visualisation import Visualisation
  26
  27
  28class QHLine(QFrame):
  29    """Line Class that defines how separator lines look.
  30    """
  31    def __init__(self, mode: str):
  32        super(QHLine, self).__init__()
  33        self.setMinimumWidth(1)
  34        self.setFixedHeight(1)
  35        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
  36        self.setFrameShadow(QFrame.Sunken)
  37        self.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Preferred, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Minimum)
  38        if mode == "single":
  39            self.setStyleSheet("background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); color: rgb(191, 207, 255);")
  40        elif mode == "multi":
  41            self.setStyleSheet("background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); color: rgb(149, 221, 185);")
  42
  43
  44class MainWindow(QMainWindow):
  45    """Main Window of the GUI. Inherits from class `QMainWindow`.
  46    """
  47    def __init__(self):
  48        """Initializes the main window.
  49        Main window contains a stacked layout with one window for single soliton case and one window for multi soliton case.
  50        Both display a welcoming text and all necessary widgets for the user to specify and submit a soliton graph.
  51        All other widgets are hidden for now and are revealed step by step, so user is guided through the use of the application.
  52        """
  53        super(MainWindow, self).__init__()
  54        self.setObjectName("MainWindow")
  55        # central widget is a stacked layout (so user can switch between the two different windows)
  56        self.central_wid = QtWidgets.QWidget()
  57        self.layout_for_wids = QtWidgets.QStackedLayout()
  58        self.central_wid.setStyleSheet("""background: white;""")
  59        # move window to the top of the screen + to the center horizontally
  60        qt_rectangle = self.frameGeometry()
  61        center_point = QtWidgets.QDesktopWidget().availableGeometry().center()
  62        qt_rectangle.moveCenter(center_point)
  63        self.move(qt_rectangle.topLeft().x(), 0)
  64        self.resize(QtCore.QSize(600, 680))
  65
  66
  67        # SOLITON AUTOMATON WIDGET
  68        self.wid_single = QtWidgets.QWidget()
  69        self.gridLayout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.wid_single)
  70        # Row 0:
  71        # Rectangle that displays the molecule
  72        self.display_molecule = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
  73        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored)
  74        self.display_molecule.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
  75        self.display_molecule.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(50, 37))
  76        startscreen = Startscreen().image
  77        self.qim = ImageQt(startscreen)
  78        self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
  79        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.display_molecule, 0, 0, 2, 5, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter|QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
  80        # Button that changes between the two windows
  81        self.change_window_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Switch Mode")
  82        self.change_window_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 20))
  83        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.change_window_button, 0, 0, 1, 1)
  84        self.change_window_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
  85        # "Mode" label
  86        self.mode = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
  87        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.mode, 0, 1, 1, 1)
  88        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 0
  89        self.row0 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
  90        self.minigrid0 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row0)
  91        self.minigrid0.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
  92        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row0, 0, 3, 1, 1)
  93        # Show Tips Checkbox
  94        self.show_tips = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Show Tips")
  95        self.show_tips.setChecked(True)
  96        self.minigrid0.addWidget(self.show_tips, 0, 0, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
  97        # Help button
  98        self.help_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("?")
  99        self.help_button.setFixedSize(QtCore.QSize(20, 20))
 100        self.minigrid0.addWidget(self.help_button, 0, 1, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 101        self.help_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 102        # Row 1: - (Image of molecule in row 0 stretches over 2 lines)
 103        # Row 2:
 104        # Label that displays short help/ a tip in the current status of the UI
 105        self.short_help = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 106        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 107        self.short_help.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 108        self.short_help.setStyleSheet("QLabel {color: rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
 109        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.short_help, 2, 0, 1, 5, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter)
 110        # Row 3:
 111        # "Traversal Mode" Checkbox
 112        self.traversal_mode = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Traversal Mode")
 113        self.traversal_mode.setChecked(False)
 114        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.traversal_mode, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 115        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 2
 116        self.row3 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 117        self.minigrid2 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row3)
 118        self.minigrid2.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 119        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row3, 3, 3, 1, 1)
 120        # Info button
 121        self.mol_info = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 122        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 123        self.mol_info.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 124        self.mol_info.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 125        self.minigrid2.addWidget(self.mol_info, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 126        # Save button for the molecule
 127        self.save = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 128        self.save.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
 129        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 130        self.save.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 131        self.save.setMaximumSize(QtCore.QSize(16777215, 32))
 132        self.save.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 133        self.minigrid2.addWidget(self.save, 3, 1, 1, 1)
 134        # Row 4:
 135        # "Molecule" label
 136        self.molecule_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 137        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.molecule_label, 4, 0, 1, 1)
 138        # Groupbox containg middle two elements of row 3
 139        self.row4 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 140        self.minigrid3 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row4)
 141        self.minigrid3.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 142        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row4, 4, 1, 1, 2)
 143        # Text field for molecule (combobox with a line edit)
 144        self.molecule_lineedit = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row4)
 145        try:
 146            with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 147                data = json.load(json_file)
 148        except:
 149            pass
 150        sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 151        for molecule in sorted_data: # Fill combobox with input strings from history
 152            self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 153        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.row4)
 154        self.molecule_lineedit.setLineEdit(edit)
 155        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
 156        self.molecule_lineedit.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
 157        self.molecule_lineedit.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
 158        self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().clear()
 159        self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(191, 207, 255);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 160        self.minigrid3.addWidget(self.molecule_lineedit, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 161        # Submit button for molecule
 162        self.submit_molecule = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 163        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 164        self.submit_molecule.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 165        self.submit_molecule.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 166        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.submit_molecule, 4, 3, 1, 1)
 167        # Parting line
 168        self.parting_line1 = QHLine("single")
 169        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.parting_line1, 5, 0, 1, 4)
 170        # Row 5: 
 171        # "Exterior nodes" label
 172        self.exterior_nodes_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 173        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.exterior_nodes_label, 6, 0, 1, 1)
 174        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 4
 175        self.row5 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 176        self.minigrid4 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row5)
 177        self.minigrid4.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 178        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row5, 6, 1, 1, 2)
 179        # "All" Checkbox
 180        self.all_exterior_nodes = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("All")
 181        self.all_exterior_nodes.setChecked(False)
 182        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.all_exterior_nodes, 6, 0, 1, 1)
 183        # Combobox to choose first exterior node
 184        self.node_1 = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5)
 185        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 186        self.node_1.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 187        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.node_1, 6, 1, 1, 1)
 188        # "&" label
 189        self.exterior_nodes_label2 = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.row5)
 190        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.exterior_nodes_label2, 6, 2, 1, 1)
 191        # Combobox to choose second exterior node
 192        self.node_2 = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5)
 193        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 194        self.node_2.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 195        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.node_2, 6, 3, 1, 1)
 196        # Submit button for exterior nodes
 197        self.submit_exterior_nodes = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 198        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 199        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 200        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 201        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.submit_exterior_nodes, 6, 3, 1, 1)
 202        # Parting line
 203        self.parting_line2 = QHLine("single")
 204        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.parting_line2, 7, 0, 1, 4)
 205        # Row 6:
 206        # "Soliton paths" label
 207        self.soliton_paths_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 208        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.soliton_paths_label, 8, 0, 1, 1)
 209        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 5
 210        self.row6 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 211        self.minigrid5 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row6)
 212        self.minigrid5.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 213        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 214        self.row6.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 215        self.row6.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 216        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row6, 8, 1, 1, 3)
 217        # Combobox to choose a soliton path
 218        self.paths = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row6)
 219        self.minigrid5.addWidget(self.paths, 8, 1, 1, 2)
 220        # Row 7:
 221        # "Show matrices" button
 222        self.show_matrices = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 223        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 224        self.show_matrices.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 225        self.show_matrices.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 226        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_matrices, 9, 1, 1, 1)
 227        # "Show end result" button
 228        self.show_end_result = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 229        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 230        self.show_end_result.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 231        self.show_end_result.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 232        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_end_result, 9, 2, 1, 1)
 233        # "Show animation" button
 234        self.show_animation = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 235        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 236        self.show_animation.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 237        self.show_animation.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 238        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_animation, 9, 3, 1, 1)
 239        # Menubar:
 240        self.menubar = QtWidgets.QMenuBar(self)
 241        self.menubar.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 564, 24))
 242        self.setMenuBar(self.menubar)
 243
 244        # Function connections of different widgets:
 245        self.change_window_button.clicked.connect(self.change_window)
 246        self.show_tips.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.tips(self.show_tips))
 247        self.traversal_mode.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.change_mode(self.traversal_mode))
 248        self.mol_info.clicked.connect(self.mol_info_clicked)
 249        self.save.clicked.connect(self.save_clicked)
 250        self.help_button.clicked.connect(self.help_clicked)
 251        self.submit_molecule.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked)
 252        self.all_exterior_nodes.stateChanged.connect(self.all_exterior_nodes_statechanged)
 253        self.submit_exterior_nodes.clicked.connect(self.submit_exterior_nodes_clicked)
 254        self.show_matrices.clicked.connect(self.show_matrices_clicked)
 255        self.show_end_result.clicked.connect(self.show_end_result_clicked)
 256        self.show_animation.clicked.connect(lambda:self.show_animation_clicked(self.show_animation))
 257        # Hide most widgets at the beginning (while retaining space) 
 258        self.hide_retain_space([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 259        self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 260        # Stylesheet:
 261        readme_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), '../styles.css')
 262        with open(readme_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as fh:
 263            self.style = fh.read()
 264        self.wid_single.setStyleSheet(self.style)
 265
 266        self.status = 1 # What status the UI currently has (1: enter molecule, 2: choose exterior nodes, 3: investigate found paths)
 267
 268
 269        # MULTI-WAVE SOLITON AUTOMATON WIDGET
 270        self.wid_mult = QtWidgets.QWidget()
 271        self.gridLayout_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.wid_mult)
 272        # Row 0:
 273        # Rectangle that displays the molecule
 274        self.display_molecule_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 275        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored)
 276        self.display_molecule_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 277        self.display_molecule_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(50, 37))
 278        startscreen_m = Startscreen().image
 279        self.qim_m = ImageQt(startscreen_m)
 280        self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 281        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.display_molecule_m, 0, 0, 2, 5, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter|QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 282        # Button that changes between the two windows
 283        self.change_window_button_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Switch Mode")
 284        self.change_window_button_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 20))
 285        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.change_window_button_m, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 286        self.change_window_button_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 287        # "Mode" label
 288        self.mode_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 289        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.mode_m, 0, 1, 1, 1)
 290        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 0
 291        self.row0_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 292        self.minigrid0_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row0_m)
 293        self.minigrid0_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 294        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row0_m, 0, 3, 1, 1)
 295        # Show Tips Checkbox
 296        self.show_tips_m = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Show Tips")
 297        self.show_tips_m.setChecked(True)
 298        self.minigrid0_m.addWidget(self.show_tips_m, 0, 0, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 299        # Help button
 300        self.help_button_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton("?")
 301        self.help_button_m.setFixedSize(QtCore.QSize(20, 20))
 302        self.minigrid0_m.addWidget(self.help_button_m, 0, 1, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 303        self.help_button_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 304        # Row 1: - (Image of molecule in row 0 stretches over 2 lines)
 305        # Row 2:
 306        # Label that displays short help/ a tip in the current status of the UI
 307        self.short_help_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 308        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 309        self.short_help_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 310        self.short_help_m.setStyleSheet("QLabel {color: rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 311        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.short_help_m, 2, 0, 1, 5, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter)
 312        # Row 3:
 313        # "Traversal Mode" Checkbox
 314        self.traversal_mode_m = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Traversal Mode")
 315        self.traversal_mode_m.setChecked(False)
 316        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.traversal_mode_m, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 317        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 2
 318        self.row3_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 319        self.minigrid2_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row3_m)
 320        self.minigrid2_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 321        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row3_m, 3, 3, 1, 1)
 322        # Info button
 323        self.mol_info_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.row3_m)
 324        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 325        self.mol_info_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 326        self.mol_info_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 327        self.minigrid2_m.addWidget(self.mol_info_m, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 328        # Save button for the molecule
 329        self.save_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.row3_m)
 330        self.save_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 331        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 332        self.save_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 333        self.save_m.setMaximumSize(QtCore.QSize(16777215, 32))
 334        self.save_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 335        self.minigrid2_m.addWidget(self.save_m, 3, 1, 1, 1)
 336        # Row 4:
 337        # "Molecule" label
 338        self.molecule_label_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 339        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.molecule_label_m, 4, 0, 1, 1)
 340        # Text field for molecule (combobox with a line edit)
 341        self.molecule_lineedit_m = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.wid_mult)
 342        try:
 343            with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 344                data = json.load(json_file)
 345        except:
 346            pass
 347        sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 348        for molecule in sorted_data:
 349            self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 350        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.wid_mult)
 351        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setLineEdit(edit)
 352        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
 353        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
 354        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
 355        self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().clear()
 356        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 357        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.molecule_lineedit_m, 4, 1, 1, 2)
 358        # Submit button for molecule
 359        self.submit_molecule_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 360        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 361        self.submit_molecule_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 362        self.submit_molecule_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 363        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_molecule_m, 4, 3, 1, 1)
 364        # Parting line
 365        self.parting_line1_m = QHLine("multi")
 366        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line1_m, 5, 0, 1, 4)
 367        # Row 5: 
 368        # "Set of bursts" label
 369        self.set_of_bursts_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 370        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.set_of_bursts_label, 6, 0, 1, 1)
 371        # Groupbox containg middle two elements of row 4
 372        self.row5_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 373        self.minigrid4_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row5_m)
 374        self.minigrid4_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 375        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row5_m, 6, 1, 1, 2)
 376        # Text field for set of bursts (combobox with a line edit)
 377        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5_m)
 378        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.row5_m)
 379        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setLineEdit(edit)
 380        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
 381        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
 382        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
 383        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 384        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.set_of_bursts_lineedit, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 385        # Submit button for set of bursts
 386        self.submit_set_of_bursts = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 387        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 388        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 389        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 390        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_set_of_bursts, 6, 3, 1, 1)
 391        # Parting line
 392        self.parting_line2_m = QHLine("multi")
 393        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line2_m, 7, 0, 1, 4)
 394        # Row 6:
 395        # "Bursts" label
 396        self.bursts_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 397        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.bursts_label, 8, 0, 1, 1)
 398        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 5
 399        self.row6_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 400        self.minigrid4_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row6_m)
 401        self.minigrid4_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 402        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row6_m, 8, 1, 1, 2)
 403        # "All" checkbox
 404        self.all_bursts = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("All")
 405        self.all_bursts.setChecked(False)
 406        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.all_bursts, 8, 0, 1, 1)
 407        # Combobox to choose burst
 408        self.burst = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row6_m)
 409        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 410        self.burst.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 411        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.burst, 8, 1, 1, 1)
 412        # Submit button for burst
 413        self.submit_burst = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 414        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 415        self.submit_burst.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 416        self.submit_burst.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 417        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_burst, 8, 3, 1, 1)
 418        # Parting line
 419        self.parting_line3_m = QHLine("multi")
 420        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line3_m, 9, 0, 1, 4)
 421        # Row 7:
 422        # "Traversals" label
 423        self.traversals_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 424        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.traversals_label, 10, 0, 1, 1)
 425        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 6
 426        self.row7_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 427        self.minigrid6_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row7_m)
 428        self.minigrid6_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 429        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 430        self.row7_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 431        self.row7_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 432        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row7_m, 10, 1, 1, 3)
 433        # Combobox to choose a traversal
 434        self.traversals = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row7_m)
 435        self.minigrid6_m.addWidget(self.traversals, 10, 1, 1, 2)
 436        # Row 8:
 437        # "Show matrices" button
 438        self.show_matrices_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 439        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 440        self.show_matrices_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 441        self.show_matrices_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 442        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_matrices_m, 11, 1, 1, 1)
 443        # "Show end result" button
 444        self.show_end_result_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 445        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 446        self.show_end_result_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 447        self.show_end_result_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 448        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_end_result_m, 11, 2, 1, 1)
 449        # "Show animation" button
 450        self.show_animation_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 451        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 452        self.show_animation_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 453        self.show_animation_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 454        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_animation_m, 11, 3, 1, 1)
 455
 456        # Function connections of different widgets:
 457        self.change_window_button_m.clicked.connect(self.change_window)
 458        self.show_tips_m.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.tips_m(self.show_tips_m))
 459        self.traversal_mode_m.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.change_mode_m(self.traversal_mode_m))
 460        self.mol_info_m.clicked.connect(self.mol_info_clicked_m)
 461        self.save_m.clicked.connect(self.save_clicked_m)
 462        self.help_button_m.clicked.connect(self.help_clicked_m)
 463        self.all_bursts.stateChanged.connect(self.all_bursts_statechanged)
 464        self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked_m)
 465        self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.connect(self.submit_set_of_bursts_clicked)
 466        self.submit_burst.clicked.connect(self.submit_burst_clicked)
 467        self.show_matrices_m.clicked.connect(self.show_matrices_clicked_m)
 468        self.show_end_result_m.clicked.connect(self.show_end_result_clicked_m)
 469        self.show_animation_m.clicked.connect(lambda:self.show_animation_clicked(self.show_animation_m))
 470        # Hide most widgets at the beginning (while retaining space)
 471        self.hide_retain_space([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 472        self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 473        # Stylesheet:
 474        readme_path_m = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), '../styles_m.css')
 475        with open(readme_path_m, "r", encoding="utf-8") as fh_m:
 476            self.style_m = fh_m.read()
 477        self.wid_mult.setStyleSheet(self.style_m)
 478
 479        self.status_m = 1 # What status the multiwave UI currently has (1: enter molecule, 2: enter burst, 3: choose burst(s), 4: investigate found paths)
 480
 481
 482        # Add both widgets to stacked layout, default widget when starting the software is single soliton case widget
 483        self.layout_for_wids.addWidget(self.wid_single)
 484        self.layout_for_wids.addWidget(self.wid_mult)
 485        self.central_wid.setLayout(self.layout_for_wids)
 486        self.setCentralWidget(self.central_wid)
 487        self.front_wid = 1
 488        self.retranslateUi()
 489        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(self)
 490
 491
 492    def retranslateUi(self):
 493        """Implements multi-language suppport. Is generated automatically when using PyQt5 UI code generator.
 494        """
 495        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
 496        self.setWindowTitle(_translate("MainWindow", "Soliton Automata Software"))
 497        self.mode.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Single-Wave Mode"))
 498        self.short_help.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu"))
 499        self.mol_info.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Info"))
 500        self.molecule_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Molecule:"))
 501        self.submit_molecule.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose molecule"))
 502        self.exterior_nodes_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Exterior nodes:"))
 503        self.exterior_nodes_label2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "&"))
 504        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose nodes"))
 505        self.soliton_paths_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Soliton paths:"))
 506        self.show_matrices.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show matrices"))
 507        self.show_end_result.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show end result"))
 508        self.show_animation.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show animation"))
 509
 510        self.mode_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Multi-Wave Mode"))
 511        self.short_help_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu"))
 512        self.mol_info_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Info"))
 513        self.molecule_label_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Molecule:"))
 514        self.submit_molecule_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose molecule"))
 515        self.set_of_bursts_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Set of bursts:"))
 516        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose bursts"))
 517        self.bursts_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Bursts:"))
 518        self.submit_burst.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Select burst(s)"))
 519        self.traversals_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Sets of paths:"))
 520        self.show_matrices_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show matrices"))
 521        self.show_end_result_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show end result"))
 522        self.show_animation_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show animation"))
 523
 524
 525    def change_window(self):
 526        """Is called when "Change Mode" button is clicked. Changes between the two widgets of the stacked layout.
 527        """
 528        if self.front_wid == 1:
 529            self.layout_for_wids.setCurrentIndex(1)
 530            self.front_wid = 2
 531        else:
 532            self.layout_for_wids.setCurrentIndex(0)
 533            self.front_wid = 1
 534
 535
 536    def change_mode(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 537        """Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in single soliton widget.
 538        In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph.
 539        When in traversal mode, the input molecule can't be edited.
 540
 541        Args:
 542            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.
 543        """
 544        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 545            # make text field uneditable and button unclickable, turn both objects grey to make those properties visually recognizable
 546            self.submit_molecule.clicked.disconnect()
 547            self.submit_molecule.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
 548            self.molecule_lineedit.setEnabled(False)
 549            self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 550            self.molecule_label.setText("Original molecule:")
 551        else:
 552            self.submit_molecule.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked)
 553            self.submit_molecule.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
 554            self.molecule_lineedit.setEnabled(True)
 555            self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(191, 207, 255);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 556            self.molecule_label.setText("Molecule:")
 557            self.submit_molecule_clicked()
 558
 559    
 560    def change_mode_m(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 561        """Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in multi soliton widget.
 562        In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph.
 563        When in traversal mode, the input molecule and the set of bursts can't be edited.
 564
 565        Args:
 566            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.
 567        """
 568        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 569            # make text field uneditable and button unclickable, turn both objects grey to make those properties visually recognizable
 570            self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.disconnect()
 571            self.submit_molecule_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
 572            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setEnabled(False)
 573            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 574            self.molecule_label_m.setText("Original molecule:")
 575            self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.disconnect()
 576            self.submit_set_of_bursts.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
 577            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setEnabled(False)
 578            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 579        else:
 580            self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked_m)
 581            self.submit_molecule_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 582            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setEnabled(True)
 583            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 584            self.molecule_label_m.setText("Molecule:")
 585            self.submit_molecule_clicked_m()
 586            self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.connect(self.submit_set_of_bursts_clicked)
 587            self.submit_set_of_bursts.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 588            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setEnabled(True)
 589            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 590
 591
 592    def tips(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 593        """Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in single soliton widget.
 594
 595        Args:
 596            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox
 597        """
 598        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 599            self.short_help.show()
 600        else:
 601            self.hide_retain_space([self.short_help])
 602            self.short_help.hide()
 603
 604
 605    def tips_m(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 606        """Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in multi soliton widget.
 607
 608        Args:
 609            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox
 610        """
 611        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 612            self.short_help_m.show()
 613        else:
 614            self.hide_retain_space([self.short_help_m])
 615            self.short_help_m.hide()
 616
 617
 618    def help_clicked(self):
 619        """Is called when "?" button is clicked in single soliton widget.
 620        Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.
 621        """
 622        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 623        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 624        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 625        grid.addWidget(label, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 626
 627        if self.status == 1:
 628            text = f"Please now enter a molecule behind \"Molecule: \"."
 629            text = text + f"This is how you define one: \n"
 630            text = text + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 631            text = text + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 632            text = text + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 633            text = text + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 634            text = text + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 635            text = text + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')\n\n"
 636            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose molecule\"."
 637            label.setText(text)
 638        elif self.status == 2:
 639            text = f"Please now choose exterior nodes. \n"
 640            text = text + f"If you check \"All\", soliton paths between all pairs of the graph's exterior nodes are displayed. \n"
 641            text = text + f"Alternatively, you can choose two exterior nodes. \n"
 642            text = text + f"The software will then only give you paths between the first and the second exterior node. \n"
 643            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose nodes\". \n\n"
 644            text = text + f"You can also save the soliton graph with the save-button on the right. \n"
 645            text = text + f"Determinism properties and possible impervious paths can be investigated by clicking on \"Info\"."
 646            label.setText(text)
 647        elif self.status == 3:
 648            text = f"Please choose a soliton path from the drop-down menu. \n"
 649            text = text + f"Each of the 3 buttons in the lower row will open a pop-up window with certain information. \n"
 650            text = text + f"Clicking on \"Choose matrices\" will display the adjacency matrices of every timestep of the soliton's traversal. \n"
 651            text = text + f"\"Show end result\" will show the resulting soliton graph after the traversal of the chosen path. \n"
 652            text = text + f"In this window, you can click \"Use\", which will put the software in traversal mode. \n"
 653            text = text + f"Traversal mode let's you use the resulting soliton graph as the new state of the soliton automaton. \n"
 654            text = text + f"You will see that this mode locks the editing of the molecule textbox. \n"
 655            text = text + f"It gives you the possibility to choose exterior nodes to then compute paths in this new state. \n"
 656            text = text + f"By clicking \"Show animation\" an animation visualising the traversal of the chosen path will be played."
 657            label.setText(text)
 658
 659        dlg.setWindowTitle("Help")
 660        dlg.exec_()
 661
 662
 663    def help_clicked_m(self):
 664        """Is called when "?" button is clicked in multi soliton widget.
 665        Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.
 666        """
 667        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 668        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 669        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 670        grid.addWidget(label, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 671
 672        if self.status_m == 1:
 673            text = f"Please now enter a molecule behind \"Molecule: \"."
 674            text = text + f"This is how you define one: \n"
 675            text = text + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 676            text = text + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 677            text = text + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 678            text = text + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 679            text = text + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 680            text = text + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')\n\n"
 681            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose molecule\"."
 682            label.setText(text)
 683        elif self.status_m == 2:
 684            text = f"Please now enter a set of bursts."
 685            text = f"This is how you define one: \n"
 686            text = text + f"- Starting and end node of a soliton are embedded in round brackets (e.g. (3, 2))\n"
 687            text = text + f"- Solitons are seperated by '||'\n"
 688            text = text + f"- The number in front of a soliton's pair of exterior nodes defines how many timesteps later than the previous soliton this soliton enters the graph\n"
 689            text = text + f"- A set of bursts is embedded in braces, where individual bursts are seperated by ';'\n"
 690            text = text + "- Example: " + "{(3,1)||1(1,2); (3,2)||4(2,1)}\n"
 691            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose bursts\". \n\n"
 692            text = text + f"You can also save the soliton graph with the save-button on the right."
 693            label.setText(text)
 694        elif self.status_m == 3:
 695            text = f"Please now choose a burst. \n"
 696            text = text + f"If you check \"All\", configuration trails for all bursts are displayed. \n"
 697            text = text + f"Alternatively, you can choose a specific burst. \n"
 698            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Select burst(s)\". \n\n"
 699            text = text + f"The soliton automaton's determinism properties can be investigated by clicking on \"Info\"."
 700            label.setText(text)
 701        elif self.status_m == 4:
 702            text = f"Please choose a configuration trail from the drop-down menu. \n"
 703            text = text + f"Configuration trails are displayed as a set of paths, where each path is marked with \"S\" and a number (e.g. \"S1\" for the first soliton). \n\n"
 704            text = text + f"Each of the 3 buttons in the lower row will open a pop-up window with certain information. \n"
 705            text = text + f"Clicking on \"Choose matrices\" will display the adjacency matrices of every timestep of the solitons' traversal. \n"
 706            text = text + f"\"Show end result\" will show the resulting soliton graph after the traversal of the chosen configuration trail. \n"
 707            text = text + f"In this window, you can click \"Use\", which will put the software in traversal mode. \n"
 708            text = text + f"Traversal mode let's you use the resulting soliton graph as the new state of the soliton automaton. \n"
 709            text = text + f"You will see that this mode locks the editing of the molecule and the set of bursts textboxes. \n"
 710            text = text + f"It gives you the possibility to choose bursts from the entered set to then compute configuration trails in this new state. \n"
 711            text = text + f"By clicking \"Show animation\" an animation visualising the traversal of the chosen configuration trail will be played."
 712            label.setText(text)
 713
 714        dlg.setWindowTitle("Help")
 715        dlg.exec_()
 716
 717
 718    def submit_molecule_clicked(self):
 719        """Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in single soliton widget.
 720        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.
 721        If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation,
 722        an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to choose exterior nodes.
 723        """
 724        self.node_1.clear()
 725        self.node_2.clear()
 726        self.smiles_string = self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
 727        try:
 728            # Try creating a soliton graph out of the entered molecule. Fails if the syntax is wrong.
 729            self.my_graph = SolitonGraph(self.smiles_string)
 730            errors = self.my_graph.validate_soliton_graph()
 731            self.automaton = SolitonAutomaton(self.my_graph)
 732            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.my_graph.bindings, False, True)
 733            self.qim = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
 734            self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 735            if errors != []:
 736                # Case in which the specified molecule is not a soliton graph. User will be provided with information which are the exact problems that make the molecule no soliton graph.
 737                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 738                self.status = 1
 739                self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 740                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
 741                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
 742                msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton graph")
 743                msg.setText("You specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.")
 744                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 745                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 746                msg.setInformativeText("See details for all incorrect parts of your molecule.")
 747                details = ""
 748                for i, error in enumerate(errors):
 749                    if i == len(errors) - 1:
 750                        details = details + f"- {error}"
 751                    else:
 752                        details = details + f"- {error}" + "\n"
 753                msg.setDetailedText(details)
 754                x = msg.exec_() # show messagebox
 755            elif self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_name_collision() == True:
 756                # Case in which two or more exterior nodes got assigned the same name.
 757                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 758                self.status = 1
 759                self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 760                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
 761                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 762                msg.setWindowTitle("Name collision")
 763                msg.setText("You specified two or more exterior nodes with the same name.")
 764                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 765                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 766                x = msg.exec_()
 767            else:
 768                # Case in which a valid soliton graph was specified. User is now able to specify pair(s) of exterior nodes.
 769                self.show_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes])
 770                self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 771                self.status = 2
 772                self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
 773                for key in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse:
 774                    self.node_1.addItem(key)
 775                    self.node_2.addItem(key)
 776        except:
 777            # No soliton graph could be created, so input syntax is wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
 778            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 779            self.status = 1
 780            self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 781            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
 782            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 783            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
 784            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
 785            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 786            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 787            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
 788            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a molecule: \n"
 789            details = details + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 790            details = details + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 791            details = details + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 792            details = details + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 793            details = details + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 794            details = details + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')"
 795            msg.setDetailedText(details)
 796            x = msg.exec_()
 797        # Edit json file if input string was turned into a soliton graph successfully
 798        if self.status == 2:
 799            try:
 800                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 801                    data = json.load(json_file)
 802            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
 803                data = []
 804            
 805            # Check if input string already exists in the data
 806            existing_molecule = next((m for m in data if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string), None)
 807            if existing_molecule:
 808                existing_molecule["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") # If the molecule exists, update "last_used"
 809            else: # If the molecule doesn't exist, add a new molecule
 810                molecule = {
 811                    "input_string": self.smiles_string,
 812                    "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
 813                    "sets_of_bursts": [
 814                    ]
 815                }
 816                data.append(molecule)
 817
 818            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
 819                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
 820
 821            # Change combobox items so that entered molecule (which is now the last used molecule) is the first element in the comboboxes of both windows
 822            sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 823            self.molecule_lineedit.clear()
 824            current_molecule_m = self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().text() # Save current text of line edit in multiwave window to add it again later
 825            self.molecule_lineedit_m.clear()
 826            for molecule in sorted_data:
 827                self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 828                self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 829            self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().setText(current_molecule_m)
 830
 831
 832    def submit_molecule_clicked_m(self):
 833        """Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in multi soliton widget.
 834        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.
 835        If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation,
 836        an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to specify a set of bursts and a stop number.
 837        """
 838        self.smiles_string_m = self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().text()
 839        try:
 840            # Try creating a soliton graph out of the entered molecule. Fails if the syntax is wrong.
 841            self.my_graph_m = SolitonGraph(self.smiles_string_m)
 842            errors = self.my_graph_m.validate_soliton_graph()
 843            self.graph_pic_m = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph_m, self.my_graph_m.bindings, False, True)
 844            self.qim_m = ImageQt(self.graph_pic_m)
 845            self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 846            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
 847            if errors != []:
 848                # Case in which the specified molecule is not a soliton graph. User will be provided with information which are the exact problems that make the molecule no soliton graph.
 849                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 850                self.status_m = 1
 851                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 852                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
 853                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 854                msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton graph")
 855                msg.setText("You specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.")
 856                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 857                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 858                msg.setInformativeText("See details for all incorrect parts of your molecule.")
 859                details = ""
 860                for i, error in enumerate(errors):
 861                    if i == len(errors) - 1:
 862                        details = details + f"- {error}"
 863                    else:
 864                        details = details + f"- {error}" + "\n"
 865                msg.setDetailedText(details)
 866                x = msg.exec_() # show messagebox
 867            elif self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_name_collision() == True:
 868                # Case in which two or more exterior nodes got assigned the same name.
 869                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 870                self.status_m = 1
 871                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 872                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
 873                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 874                msg.setWindowTitle("Name collision")
 875                msg.setText("You specified two or more exterior nodes with the same name.")
 876                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 877                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 878                x = msg.exec_()
 879            else:
 880                # Case in which a valid soliton graph was specified. User is now able to specify a set of bursts.
 881                self.show_multiple([self.save_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts])
 882                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 883                self.status_m = 2
 884                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a set of bursts or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 885        except:
 886            # No soliton graph could be created, so input syntax is wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
 887            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.mol_info_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 888            self.status_m = 1
 889            self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 890            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
 891            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 892            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
 893            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
 894            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 895            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 896            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
 897            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a molecule: \n"
 898            details = details + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 899            details = details + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 900            details = details + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 901            details = details + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 902            details = details + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 903            details = details + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')"
 904            msg.setDetailedText(details)
 905            x = msg.exec_()
 906        # Edit json file if input string was turned into a soliton graph successfully
 907        if self.status_m == 2:
 908            try:
 909                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 910                    data = json.load(json_file)
 911            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
 912                data = []
 913            
 914            # Check if input string already exists in the data
 915            existing_molecule = next((m for m in data if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string_m), None)
 916            if existing_molecule:
 917                existing_molecule["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") # If the molecule exists, update "last_used"
 918            else: # If the molecule doesn't exist, add a new molecule
 919                molecule = {
 920                    "input_string": self.smiles_string_m,
 921                    "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
 922                    "sets_of_bursts": [
 923                    ]
 924                }
 925                existing_molecule = molecule
 926                data.append(molecule)
 927
 928            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
 929                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
 930
 931            # Change combobox items so that entered molecule (which is now the last used molecule) is the first element in the comboboxes of both windows
 932            sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 933            self.molecule_lineedit_m.clear()
 934            current_molecule = self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
 935            self.molecule_lineedit.clear()
 936            for molecule in sorted_data:
 937                self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 938                self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 939            self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().setText(current_molecule)
 940
 941            # Add all set of bursts from history of the current molecule
 942            sorted_burstsets = sorted(existing_molecule["sets_of_bursts"], key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 943            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
 944            for burstset in sorted_burstsets:
 945                self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.addItem(burstset["set_of_bursts"])
 946            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.lineEdit().clear()
 947
 948
 949    def mol_info_clicked(self):
 950        """Is called when "Info" button in single soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether
 951        the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic and reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism and all impervious paths.
 952        """
 953
 954        def save_info():
 955            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all info on soliton automaton/ soliton graph should be saved.
 956            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule.
 957            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
 958            """
 959            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
 960            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'info.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
 961            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
 962                path = name[0]
 963                file = open(path, "w")
 964                file.write(txt_text)
 965                file.close()
 966        
 967        txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.smiles_string} \n\n"
 968        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 969        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 970        # Deterministic
 971        label_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 972        label_det.setText("Deterministic:")
 973        txt_text = txt_text + f"Deterministic: "
 974        grid.addWidget(label_det, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 975        det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 976        if self.automaton.deterministic:
 977            det_bool.setText("Yes")
 978            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
 979        else: 
 980            det_bool.setText("No")
 981            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
 982        grid.addWidget(det_bool, 0, 1, 1, 1)
 983        # Strongly deterministic
 984        label_strong_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 985        label_strong_det.setText("Strongly deterministic:")
 986        txt_text = txt_text + f"Strongly deterministic: "
 987        grid.addWidget(label_strong_det, 1, 0, 1, 1)
 988        strong_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 989        if self.automaton.strongly_deterministic:
 990            strong_det_bool.setText("Yes")
 991            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
 992        else: 
 993            strong_det_bool.setText("No")
 994            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
 995        grid.addWidget(strong_det_bool, 1, 1, 1, 1)
 996        # Reachability-deterministic
 997        label_reach_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 998        label_reach_det.setText("Reachability-deterministic:")
 999        txt_text = txt_text + f"Reachability-deterministic: "
1000        grid.addWidget(label_reach_det, 2, 0, 1, 1)
1001        reach_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1002        if self.automaton.reachability_deterministic:
1003            reach_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1004            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1005        else: 
1006            reach_det_bool.setText("No")
1007            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1008        grid.addWidget(reach_det_bool, 2, 1, 1, 1)
1009        # Degree of non-determinism
1010        label_degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1011        label_degree.setText("Degree of non-determinism:")
1012        txt_text = txt_text + f"Degree of non-determinism: "
1013        grid.addWidget(label_degree, 3, 0, 1, 1)
1014        degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1015        degree.setText(str(self.automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism))
1016        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism} \n"
1017        grid.addWidget(degree, 3, 1, 1, 1)
1018        # Impervious paths
1019        label_imp_paths = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1020        label_imp_paths.setText("Impervious path(s):")
1021        txt_text = txt_text + f"Impervious path(s): "
1022        grid.addWidget(label_imp_paths, 4, 0, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1023        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1024        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1025        save_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
1026        grid.addWidget(save_button, 5, 1, 1, 1)
1027        save_button.clicked.connect(save_info)
1028        group = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
1029        layout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(group)
1030        layout.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
1031        impervs = self.automaton.find_impervious_paths()
1032        if impervs == []:
1033            layout.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel("-"))
1034            txt_text = txt_text + f"-"
1035        for i, path in enumerate(impervs):
1036            layout.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(path), i, 0, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1037            txt_text = txt_text + f"{path}"
1038            if i != len(impervs)-1:
1039                txt_text = txt_text + f", "
1040        grid.addWidget(group, 4, 1, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1041        dlg.setWindowTitle("Info")
1042        dlg.exec_()
1043
1044    
1045    def mol_info_clicked_m(self):
1046        """Is called when "Info" button in multi soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether
1047        the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic, reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism.
1048        """
1049
1050        def save_info():
1051            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all info on soliton automaton/ soliton graph should be saved.
1052            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule.
1053            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1054            """
1055            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1056            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'info.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1057            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1058                path = name[0]
1059                file = open(path, "w")
1060                file.write(txt_text)
1061                file.close()
1062        
1063        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1064        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
1065        label_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1066        txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.smiles_string_m} \n"
1067        txt_text = txt_text + f"Set of bursts: {self.bursts} \n\n"
1068        label_det.setText("Deterministic:")
1069        txt_text = txt_text + f"Deterministic: "
1070        grid.addWidget(label_det, 0, 0, 1, 1)
1071        det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1072        if self.multi_automaton.deterministic:
1073            det_bool.setText("Yes")
1074            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1075        else: 
1076            det_bool.setText("No")
1077            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1078        grid.addWidget(det_bool, 0, 1, 1, 1)
1079        label_strong_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1080        label_strong_det.setText("Strongly deterministic:")
1081        txt_text = txt_text + f"Strongly deterministic: "
1082        grid.addWidget(label_strong_det, 1, 0, 1, 1)
1083        strong_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1084        if self.multi_automaton.strongly_deterministic:
1085            strong_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1086            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1087        else: 
1088            strong_det_bool.setText("No")
1089            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1090        grid.addWidget(strong_det_bool, 1, 1, 1, 1)
1091
1092        label_reach_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1093        label_reach_det.setText("Reachability-deterministic:")
1094        txt_text = txt_text + f"Reachability-deterministic: "
1095        grid.addWidget(label_reach_det, 2, 0, 1, 1)
1096        reach_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1097        if self.multi_automaton.reachability_deterministic:
1098            reach_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1099            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1100        else: 
1101            reach_det_bool.setText("No")
1102            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1103        grid.addWidget(reach_det_bool, 2, 1, 1, 1)
1104
1105        label_degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1106        label_degree.setText("Degree of non-determinism:")
1107        txt_text = txt_text + f"Degree of non-determinism: "
1108        grid.addWidget(label_degree, 3, 0, 1, 1)
1109        degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1110        degree.setText(str(self.multi_automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism))
1111        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.multi_automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism} \n"
1112        grid.addWidget(degree, 3, 1, 1, 1)
1113
1114        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1115        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1116        save_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
1117        grid.addWidget(save_button, 4, 1, 1, 1)
1118        save_button.clicked.connect(save_info)
1119        dlg.setWindowTitle("Info")
1120        dlg.exec_()
1121
1122
1123    def save_clicked(self):
1124        """Is called when user clicks button to save the graph visualisation in single soliton widget.
1125        Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the image should be saved.
1126        Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1127        """
1128        option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1129        name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'graph.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1130        if name != ('', ''):
1131            path = name[0]
1132            # turn PIL Image into byte array 
1133            imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1134            self.graph_pic.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1135            imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1136            # save image at specified path
1137            file = open(path, "wb")
1138            file.write(imgByteArr)
1139            file.close()
1140
1141
1142    def save_clicked_m(self):
1143        """Is called when user clicks button to save the graph visualisation in multi soliton widget.
1144        Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the image should be saved.
1145        Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1146        """
1147        option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1148        name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_mult, 'Save File', 'graph.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1149        if name != ('', ''):
1150            path = name[0] 
1151            imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1152            self.graph_pic_m.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1153            imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1154            file = open(path, "wb")
1155            file.write(imgByteArr)
1156            file.close()
1157
1158    
1159    def submit_set_of_bursts_clicked(self):
1160        """Is called when user clicks button to submit a set of bursts.
1161        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax.
1162        If the user's set of bursts is valid it displays all the necessary widgets for the user to choose a burst.
1163        """
1164        bursts = self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
1165        self.bursts = bursts
1166        self.burst.clear()
1167        try:
1168            # Try creating a multi soliton automaton with the graph and the entered set of bursts. Fails if syntax of set of bursts is wrong.
1169            self.multi_automaton = MultiwaveSolitonAutomaton(self.my_graph_m, bursts)
1170            bursts = bursts.split(";")
1171            for burst in bursts:
1172                burst = re.sub(r"[{}]+", "", burst)
1173                self.burst.addItem(burst)
1174            self.show_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst])
1175            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1176            self.status_m = 3
1177            self.short_help_m.setText("Choose a burst or use all bursts in the set of bursts for finding paths")
1178        except:
1179            # Case in which syntax was wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
1180            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1181            self.status_m = 2
1182            self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a set of bursts or choose one from the drop-down menu")
1183            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
1184            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
1185            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
1186            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
1187            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
1188            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
1189            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
1190            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a set of bursts: \n"
1191            details = details + f"- Starting and end node of a soliton are embedded in round brackets (e.g. (3, 2))\n"
1192            details = details + f"- Solitons are seperated by '||'\n"
1193            details = details + f"- The number in front of a soliton's pair of exterior nodes defines how many timesteps later than the previous soliton this soliton enters the graph\n"
1194            details = details + f"- A set of bursts is embedded in braces, where individual bursts are seperated by ';'\n"
1195            details = details + "- Example: " + "{(3,1)||1(1,2); (3,2)||4(2,1)}\n"
1196            msg.setDetailedText(details)
1197            x = msg.exec_()
1198        if self.status_m == 3:
1199            try:
1200                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
1201                    data = json.load(json_file)
1202            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
1203                data = []
1204            
1205            # Look for the current molecule in the data
