1206            index_of_molecule = next((i for i, m in enumerate(data) if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string_m), None)
1207            if index_of_molecule is not None:
1208                existing_burst = next((b for b in data[index_of_molecule]["sets_of_bursts"] if b["set_of_bursts"] == self.bursts), None)
1209
1210                if existing_burst: # If the set of bursts exists, update the "last_used" field
1211                    existing_burst["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
1212                else: # If the set of bursts doesn't exist, add a new object to the "sets_of_bursts" list
1213                    burst_data = {
1214                        "set_of_bursts": self.bursts,
1215                        "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
1216                    }
1217                    data[index_of_molecule]["sets_of_bursts"].append(burst_data)
1218
1219            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
1220                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
1221
1222            # Change combobox items so that entered set of bursts (which is now the last used set of bursts) is the first element in the combobox
1223            sorted_burstsets = sorted(data[index_of_molecule]["sets_of_bursts"], key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
1224            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
1225            for burstset in sorted_burstsets:
1226                self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.addItem(burstset["set_of_bursts"])
1227
1228
1229    def all_exterior_nodes_statechanged(self):
1230        """Is called when "All" checkbox in single soliton widget is checked/ unchecked.
1231        Hides/ unhides widgets to choose a pair of exterior nodes.
1232        """
1233        if self.all_exterior_nodes.isChecked():
1234            self.hide_multiple([self.node_1, self.exterior_nodes_label2, self.node_2])
1235        else: self.show_multiple([self.node_1, self.exterior_nodes_label2, self.node_2])
1236
1237
1238    def all_bursts_statechanged(self):
1239        """Is called when "All" checkbox in multi soliton widget is checked/ unchecked.
1240        Hides/ unhides widgets to choose a burst.
1241        """
1242        if self.all_bursts.isChecked():
1243            self.burst.hide()
1244        else: self.burst.show()
1245
1246
1247    def submit_exterior_nodes_clicked(self):
1248        """Is called when user clicks button to submit exterior nodes.
1249        Displays all possible soliton paths between the two chosen nodes/ all pairs of exterior nodes.
1250        Informs the user if no soliton path exists between them.
1251        Otherwise all the necessary widgets for the user to choose a computed soliton path and look at further information on it are revealed.
1252        """
1253        self.path_index = None # we need this variable later in show_animation_clicked
1254        self.paths.clear()
1255        if self.all_exterior_nodes.isChecked(): # User wants to see all soliton paths between all pairs of exterior nodes
1256            key = self.automaton.matrix_to_string(nx.to_numpy_array(self.my_graph.graph))
1257            self.found_paths = self.automaton.states_plus_soliton_paths[key][1]
1258        else: # User selected a specific pair of exterior nodes
1259            node1 = self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse[self.node_1.currentText()]
1260            node2 = self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse[self.node_2.currentText()]
1261            self.found_paths = self.automaton.call_find_all_paths_given_nodes(node1, node2, self.my_graph)
1262        if self.found_paths == []: # No paths were found
1263            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
1264            self.status = 2
1265            self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
1266            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
1267            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
1268            msg.setWindowTitle("No path found")
1269            msg.setText("There exists no soliton path between these exterior nodes.")
1270            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Information)
1271            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
1272            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with different exterior nodes or a different soliton automaton.")
1273            x = msg.exec_()
1274        else: # Paths were found and are now added to combobox
1275            self.incomplete_paths_indices = []
1276            for p, soliton_path in enumerate(self.found_paths):
1277                if isinstance(soliton_path, SolitonPath): # if soliton path is a real soliton path and no incomplete path were search was terminated
1278                    self.paths.addItem(str(soliton_path.path_for_user))
1279                else:
1280                    self.incomplete_paths_indices.append(p)
1281            self.found_paths = [i for j, i in enumerate(self.found_paths) if j not in self.incomplete_paths_indices] # Need to display the right number of paths
1282            self.soliton_paths_label.setText(f"Soliton paths ({len(self.found_paths)}):")
1283            self.show_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
1284            self.status = 3
1285            self.short_help.setText("Select a soliton path and investigate it further")
1286
1287    
1288    def submit_burst_clicked(self):
1289        """Is called when user clicks button to submit burst(s).
1290        Displays all possible traversals for the chosen burst/ all bursts.
1291        Informs the user if no traversals exists for it/ them.
1292        Otherwise all the necessary widgets for the user to choose a computed traversals and look at further information on it are revealed.
1293        """
1294        self.traversal_index = None # we need this variable later in show_animation_clicked
1295        self.traversals.clear()
1296        if self.all_bursts.isChecked(): # User wants to see all configuration trails for all bursts in the set of bursts
1297            key = self.multi_automaton.matrix_to_string(nx.to_numpy_array(self.my_graph_m.graph))
1298            self.found_traversals = self.multi_automaton.states_plus_traversals[key][1]
1299            self.num_traversals_per_burst = self.multi_automaton.states_plus_traversals[key][2]
1300        else: # User selected a specific burst
1301            burst_index = int(self.burst.currentIndex())
1302            self.found_traversals = self.multi_automaton.call_find_all_travs_given_burst(self.multi_automaton.bursts_dicts[burst_index], self.my_graph_m)
1303            self.num_traversals_per_burst = None
1304        if self.found_traversals == []: # No configuration trails were found
1305            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1306            self.status_m = 3
1307            self.short_help_m.setText("Choose a burst or use all bursts in the set of bursts for finding paths")
1308            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
1309            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
1310            msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton paths found")
1311            msg.setText("With this burst(s), not all solitons can traverse the soliton graph successfully.")
1312            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Information)
1313            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
1314            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with different bursts.")
1315            x = msg.exec_()
1316        else: # Configuration trails were found and are now added to combobox
1317            self.incomplete_traversals_indices = []
1318            for t, traversal in enumerate(self.found_traversals):
1319                if isinstance(traversal, Traversal): # if traversal is a real traversal and no incomplete configuration trail were search was terminated
1320                    this_traversal = ""
1321                    for i, path in enumerate(traversal.traversal_for_user):
1322                        this_traversal = this_traversal + path
1323                        if i != len(traversal.traversal_for_user)-1:
1324                            this_traversal = this_traversal + ", "
1325                    self.traversals.addItem(this_traversal)
1326                else:
1327                    self.incomplete_traversals_indices.append(t)
1328            self.found_traversals = [i for j, i in enumerate(self.found_traversals) if j not in self.incomplete_traversals_indices]
1329            self.traversals_label.setText(f"Sets of paths ({len(self.found_traversals)}):") # Display right number of configuration trails
1330            self.show_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1331            self.status_m = 4
1332            self.short_help_m.setText("Select a set of paths and investigate it further")
1333            sep_index = 0
1334            if self.num_traversals_per_burst:
1335                for n, num in enumerate(self.num_traversals_per_burst): # add seperators to distinct which traversals resulted from which burst
1336                    if num != 0 and n != len(self.num_traversals_per_burst)-1: # don't add if there is no traversal for this burst of if it's the last burst
1337                        sep_index += num
1338                        self.traversals.insertSeparator(sep_index)
1339                        self.found_traversals.insert(sep_index, None) # so the indices in found_traversals correspond with the indices of the combobox items
1340                        self.incomplete_traversals_indices = [(index + 1) if (index >= sep_index) else index for index in self.incomplete_traversals_indices]
1341                        sep_index += 1 # indices got shifted by one because seperator was added
1342
1343
1344    def show_matrices_clicked(self):
1345        """Is called when user clicks button to have the adjacency matrices of every timestep in single soliton widget displayed.
1346        Makes a small window pop up that shows the labelled adjacency matrices and provides a save button.
1347        """
1348
1349        def save_matrices():
1350            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all adjacency matrices should be saved.
1351            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule and the soliton path.
1352            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1353            """
1354            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1355            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'matrices.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1356            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1357                path = name[0]
1358                file = open(path, "w")
1359                file.write(txt_text)
1360                file.close()
1361
1362        index = self.paths.currentIndex()
1363        desired_path = self.found_paths[index]
1364
1365        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1366        scrollArea = QScrollArea(dlg)
1367        scrollArea.setStyleSheet("font: 13pt Courier;")
1368        widget = QtWidgets.QWidget()
1369        vbox = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
1370        if re.search(',', self.my_graph.way) is not None:
1371            txt_text = f"Way to soliton graph: {self.my_graph.way} \n"
1372        else:
1373            txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.my_graph.way} \n"
1374        txt_text = txt_text + f"Soliton path: {desired_path.path_for_user} \n \n"
1375        # labelling of matrix depends on wether we have long node labels ("aa", "ab", ...) or short ones ("a", "b", ...)
1376        if (len(self.my_graph.labels) - len(self.my_graph.exterior_nodes)) > 26:
1377            matrix_label_horizontal = "    "
1378            long_labels = True
1379        else:
1380            matrix_label_horizontal = "   "
1381            long_labels = False
1382        for key in self.my_graph.labels:
1383            if long_labels:
1384                if self.my_graph.labels[key] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[key]) < 10:
1385                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]}  "
1386                else:
1387                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]} "
1388            else:
1389                if self.my_graph.labels[key] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[key]) >= 10:
1390                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]} "
1391                else:
1392                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]}  "
1393        # for show-matrices-window the node labels are added to the matrix string and this labelled matrix is added to scroll area
1394        # for matrices.txt we add everything (horizontal label and every row of matrix) line by line
1395        for i in range(len(desired_path.adjacency_matrices_list)):
1396            txt_text = txt_text + f"Timestep {i}: \n"
1397            txt_text = txt_text + f"{matrix_label_horizontal} \n"
1398            matrix_labelled = ""
1399            matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{matrix_label_horizontal}\n"
1400            matrix = str(desired_path.adjacency_matrices_list[i])
1401            matrix = re.sub(r"[matrix(]", "", matrix)
1402            matrix = re.sub(r"[)]", "", matrix)
1403            for j in range(len(matrix.splitlines())):
1404                if long_labels:
1405                    if self.my_graph.labels[j] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[j]) < 10:
1406                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1407                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1408                    else:
1409                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1410                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1411                else:
1412                    if self.my_graph.labels[j] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[j]) >= 10:
1413                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1414                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1415                    else:
1416                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1417                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1418            txt_text = txt_text + f"\n"
1419            vbox.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(matrix_labelled))
1420        widget.setLayout(vbox)
1421        scrollArea.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1422        scrollArea.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1423        scrollArea.setWidgetResizable(True)
1424        scrollArea.setWidget(widget)
1425        scrollArea.setFixedSize(540, 405)
1426        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1427        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1428        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(454, 359, 70, 30))
1429        save_button.clicked.connect(save_matrices)
1430
1431        dlg.setWindowTitle("Adjacency Matrices")
1432        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1433        dlg.exec_()
1434
1435
1436    def show_matrices_clicked_m(self):
1437        """Is called when user clicks button to have the adjacency matrices of every timestep in multi soliton widget displayed.
1438        Makes a small window pop up that shows the labelled adjacency matrices and provides a save button.
1439        """
1440
1441        def save_matrices():
1442            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all adjacency matrices should be saved.
1443            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule and the soliton path.
1444            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1445            """
1446            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1447            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_mult, 'Save File', 'matrices.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1448            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1449                path = name[0]
1450                file = open(path, "w")
1451                file.write(txt_text)
1452                file.close()
1453
1454        index = self.traversals.currentIndex()
1455        desired_traversal = self.found_traversals[index]
1456
1457        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_mult)
1458        scrollArea = QScrollArea(dlg)
1459        scrollArea.setStyleSheet("font: 13pt Courier;")
1460        widget = QtWidgets.QWidget()
1461        vbox = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
1462        if re.search(',', self.my_graph_m.way) is not None:
1463            txt_text = f"Way to soliton graph: {self.my_graph_m.way} \n"
1464        else:
1465            txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.my_graph_m.way} \n"
1466        txt_text = txt_text + f"Set of bursts: {self.bursts} \n"
1467        this_traversal = ""
1468        for i, path in enumerate(desired_traversal.traversal_for_user):
1469            this_traversal = this_traversal + path
1470            if i != len(desired_traversal.traversal_for_user)-1:
1471                this_traversal = this_traversal + ", "
1472        txt_text = txt_text + f"Traversal: {this_traversal} \n \n"
1473        if (len(self.my_graph_m.labels) - len(self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes)) > 26:
1474            matrix_label_horizontal = "    "
1475            long_labels = True
1476        else:
1477            matrix_label_horizontal = "   "
1478            long_labels = False
1479        for key in self.my_graph_m.labels:
1480            if long_labels:
1481                if self.my_graph_m.labels[key] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[key]) < 10:
1482                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]}  "
1483                else:
1484                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]} "
1485            else:
1486                if self.my_graph_m.labels[key] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[key]) >= 10:
1487                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]} "
1488                else:
1489                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]}  "
1490        for i in range(len(desired_traversal.adjacency_matrices_list)):
1491            txt_text = txt_text + f"Timestep {i}: \n"
1492            txt_text = txt_text + f"{matrix_label_horizontal} \n"
1493            matrix_labelled = ""
1494            matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{matrix_label_horizontal}\n"
1495            matrix = str(desired_traversal.adjacency_matrices_list[i])
1496            matrix = re.sub(r"[matrix(]", "", matrix)
1497            matrix = re.sub(r"[)]", "", matrix)
1498            for j in range(len(matrix.splitlines())):
1499                if long_labels:
1500                    if self.my_graph_m.labels[j] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[j]) < 10:
1501                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1502                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1503                    else:
1504                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1505                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1506                else:
1507                    if self.my_graph_m.labels[j] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[j]) >= 10:
1508                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1509                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1510                    else:
1511                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1512                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1513            txt_text = txt_text + f"\n"
1514            vbox.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(matrix_labelled))
1515        widget.setLayout(vbox)
1516        scrollArea.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1517        scrollArea.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1518        scrollArea.setWidgetResizable(True)
1519        scrollArea.setWidget(widget)
1520        scrollArea.setFixedSize(540, 405)
1521        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1522        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1523        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(454, 359, 70, 30))
1524        save_button.clicked.connect(save_matrices)
1525
1526        dlg.setWindowTitle("Adjacency Matrices")
1527        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1528        dlg.exec_()
1529    
1530
1531    def show_end_result_clicked(self):
1532        """Is called when user clicks button to have the resulting graph (after soliton path is traversed) in single soliton widget displayed.
1533        Makes a small window pop up that shows the graph visualisation and provides a save button.
1534        """
1535
1536        def save_end_result():
1537            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the resulting graph should be saved.
1538            Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1539            """
1540            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1541            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'result.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1542            if name != ('', ''):
1543                path = name[0]
1544                imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1545                result_pic.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1546                imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1547                file = open(path, "wb")
1548                file.write(imgByteArr)
1549                file.close()
1550
1551        def use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg: QDialog):
1552            """Uses the end result of the selected path as the new soliton graph. Puts the software in traversal mode.
1553
1554            Args:
1555                dlg (QDialog): The dialog window that shows the end result.
1556            """
1557            current_way = self.my_graph.way
1558            new_soliton_graph = copy.deepcopy(self.desired_path.resulting_soliton_graph)
1559            self.my_graph = new_soliton_graph
1560            self.my_graph.way = f"{current_way}, {self.desired_path.path_for_user}"
1561            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.my_graph.bindings, False, True)
1562            self.qim = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
1563            self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
1564
1565            self.traversal_mode.setChecked(True)
1566            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
1567            self.status = 2
1568            self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
1569            self.node_1.setCurrentIndex(0)
1570            self.node_2.setCurrentIndex(0)
1571            dlg.close()
1572
1573        index = self.paths.currentIndex()
1574        self.desired_path = self.found_paths[index]
1575        bindings_index = len(self.desired_path.path) - 1
1576        result_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.desired_path.bindings_list[bindings_index], False, True)
1577        qim = ImageQt(result_pic)
1578
1579        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1580        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1581        label.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 540, 405))
1582        label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim))
1583        label.setScaledContents(True)
1584        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1585        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1586        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(470, 375, 70, 30))
1587        save_button.clicked.connect(save_end_result)
1588        use_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Use", dlg)
1589        use_button.clicked.connect(lambda: use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg))
1590        use_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(395, 375, 70, 30))
1591
1592        dlg.setWindowTitle("End result")
1593        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1594        dlg.exec_()
1595
1596    
1597    def show_end_result_clicked_m(self):
1598        """Is called when user clicks button to have the resulting graph (after soliton path is traversed) in multi soliton widget displayed.
1599        Makes a small window pop up that shows the graph visualisation and provides a save button.
1600        """
1601
1602        def save_end_result():
1603            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the resulting graph should be saved.
1604            Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1605            """
1606            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1607            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_mult, 'Save File', 'result.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1608            if name != ('', ''):
1609                path = name[0]
1610                imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1611                result_pic.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1612                imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1613                file = open(path, "wb")
1614                file.write(imgByteArr)
1615                file.close()
1616
1617        def use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg: QDialog):
1618            """Uses the end result of the selected path as the new soliton graph. Puts the software in traversal mode.
1619
1620            Args:
1621                dlg (QDialog): The dialog window that shows the end result.
1622            """
1623            current_way = self.my_graph_m.way
1624            new_soliton_graph = copy.deepcopy(self.desired_traversal.resulting_soliton_graph)
1625            self.my_graph_m = new_soliton_graph
1626            self.my_graph_m.way = f"{current_way}, {self.desired_traversal.traversal_for_user}"
1627            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph_m, self.my_graph_m.bindings, False, True)
1628            self.qim_m = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
1629            self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
1630
1631            self.traversal_mode_m.setChecked(True)
1632            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1633            self.status_m = 3
1634            self.short_help_m.setText("Choose a burst or use all bursts in the set of bursts for finding paths")
1635            self.burst.setCurrentIndex(0)
1636            dlg.close()
1637
1638        index = self.traversals.currentIndex()
1639        self.desired_traversal = self.found_traversals[index]
1640        result_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.desired_traversal.resulting_soliton_graph, self.desired_traversal.resulting_soliton_graph.bindings, False, True)
1641        qim = ImageQt(result_pic)
1642
1643        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_mult)
1644        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1645        label.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 540, 405))
1646        label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim))
1647        label.setScaledContents(True)
1648        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1649        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1650        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(470, 375, 70, 30))
1651        save_button.clicked.connect(save_end_result)
1652        use_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Use", dlg)
1653        use_button.clicked.connect(lambda: use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg))
1654        use_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(395, 375, 70, 30))
1655
1656        dlg.setWindowTitle("End result")
1657        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1658        dlg.exec_()
1659
1660
1661    def show_animation_clicked(self, button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1662        """Is called when user clicks button to have the animation of the soliton traversing the graph displayed.
1663        Makes a small window pop up that shows the animation and provides a "pause"/ "play" button, a "back" and a "forward" button and a save button.
1664        Instead of displaying the `gif` it uses a sequence of `PIL` images and always shows the next image after a certain time.
1665        Calls different animation functions depending on whether application is in single or multi soliton widget. 
1666
1667        Args:
1668            button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1669        """
1670
1671        def save_animation():
1672            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the animation should be saved.
1673            Only allows `.gif` file suffix.
1674            """
1675            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1676            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(wid, 'Save File', 'animation.gif', 'Images (*.gif)', options = option)
1677            if name != ('', ''):
1678                path = name[0]
1679                if button == self.show_animation: # single soliton animation
1680                    ani = Animation.graph_animation(self.my_graph, self.desired_path)
1681                else: ani = Animation.graph_animation_multiwave(self.my_graph_m, self.desired_traversal) # multi soliton animation
1682                ani.save(path, writer='pillow', dpi = 600)
1683
1684        def update_image():
1685            """Displays next image of animation.
1686            """
1687            self.step += 1
1688            if button == self.show_animation: # Single soliton widget
1689                if self.step == len(self.desired_path.path): # start animation all over again as soon as end is reached (endless loop)
1690                    self.step = 0
1691            else: # Multi soliton widget
1692                if self.step == len(self.desired_traversal.pos):
1693                    self.step = 0
1694            im = self.pil_images[self.step]
1695            qim = ImageQt(im)
1696            self.label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim.copy()))
1697            self.label.setScaledContents(True)
1698
1699        def update_image_reverse():
1700            """Displays previous image of animation.
1701            """
1702            self.step -= 1
1703            if button == self.show_animation:
1704                if self.step == -1: # if start of animation was reached in the step before then continue at end of animation
1705                    self.step = len(self.desired_path.path) - 1
1706            else:
1707                if self.step == -1:
1708                    self.step = len(self.desired_traversal.pos) - 1
1709            im = self.pil_images[self.step]
1710            qim = ImageQt(im)
1711            self.label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim.copy()))
1712            self.label.setScaledContents(True)
1713            
1714        def pause_animation(button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1715            """Is called when "pause"/ "play" button is pressed.
1716            Pauses/ plays animation by stopping the timer/ starting the timer.
1717
1718            Args:
1719                button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1720            """
1721            if self.timer.isActive(): # pause
1722                self.timer.stop()
1723                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1724                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1725                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1726            else: # play
1727                update_image()
1728                self.timer.start(800)  # triggers event every 800 millisecond
1729                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1730                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/pause.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1731                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/pause.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1732
1733        def next_img(button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1734            """Is called when "forward" button is pressed.
1735            Stops the timer if it is still active and calls `update_image` function.
1736
1737            Args:
1738                button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1739            """
1740            if self.timer.isActive():
1741                self.timer.stop()
1742                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1743                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1744                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1745            update_image()
1746
1747        def prev_img(button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1748            """Is called when "back" button is pressed.
1749            Stops the timer if it is still active and calls `update_image_reverse` function.
1750
1751            Args:
1752                button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1753            """
1754            if self.timer.isActive():
1755                self.timer.stop()
1756                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1757                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1758                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1759            update_image_reverse()
1760            
1761        if button == self.show_animation:
1762            dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1763        else: dlg = QDialog(self.wid_mult)
1764        self.label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1765        self.label.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 540, 405))
1766        
1767        if button == self.show_animation:
1768            wid = self.wid_single
1769        else:
1770            wid = self.wid_mult
1771        
1772        if button == self.show_animation:
1773            if self.path_index != self.paths.currentIndex():
1774                self.path_index = self.paths.currentIndex()
1775                self.desired_path = self.found_paths[self.path_index]
1776                plots_and_arrays = Animation.list_of_plots_and_arrays(self.my_graph, self.desired_path)
1777                self.pil_images = Animation.list_of_pil_images(plots_and_arrays)
1778        else:
1779            if self.traversal_index != self.traversals.currentIndex():
1780                self.traversal_index = self.traversals.currentIndex()
1781                self.desired_traversal = self.found_traversals[self.traversal_index]
1782                plots_and_arrays = Animation.list_of_plots_and_arrays_multiwave(self.my_graph_m, self.desired_traversal)
1783                self.pil_images = Animation.list_of_pil_images(plots_and_arrays)
1784
1785        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1786        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(470, 375, 70, 30))
1787        pause_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1788        pause_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(240, 375, 30, 30))
1789        pause_button.clicked.connect(lambda: pause_animation(pause_button))
1790        next_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1791        next_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(275, 375, 30, 30))
1792        next_button.clicked.connect(lambda: next_img(pause_button))
1793        prev_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1794        prev_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(205, 375, 30, 30))
1795        prev_button.clicked.connect(lambda: prev_img(pause_button))
1796        if button == self.show_animation:
1797            save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1798            save_button.clicked.connect(save_animation)
1799            pause_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1800            next_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/right-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1801            prev_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/left-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193)}")
1802        else:
1803            save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1804            save_button.clicked.connect(save_animation)
1805            pause_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1806            next_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/right-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1807            prev_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/left-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123)}")
1808
1809        self.step = -1
1810        self.timer = QtCore.QTimer(self)
1811        self.timer.timeout.connect(update_image) # timer calls `update_image` everytime event is triggered
1812        update_image()
1813
1814        dlg.setWindowTitle("Animation")
1815        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1816        dlg.closeEvent = self.stop_animation # stop timer when window is closed
1817        dlg.exec_()
1818
1819
1820    def stop_animation(self, event):
1821        """Stops the timer that is used for the animation.
1822        Without this method the application would crash if the animation window would get closed.
1823        Args:
1824            event: Close event of the window that shows animation.
1825        """
1826        self.timer.disconnect()
1827
1828
1829    def hide_retain_space(self, widgets: list):
1830        """Retains the space of widgets even when they are hidden.
1831
1832        Args:
1833            widgets (list): Widgets whose spaces should be retained.
1834        """
1835        for widget in widgets:
1836            retain = widget.sizePolicy()
1837            retain.setRetainSizeWhenHidden(True)
1838            widget.setSizePolicy(retain)
1839
1840
1841    def hide_multiple(self, widgets: list):
1842        """Hides multiple widgets at once, makes code a lot shorter because it unites several calls of the same function.
1843
1844        Args:
1845            widgets (list): Widgets who should be hidden.
1846        """
1847        for widget in widgets:
1848            widget.hide()
1849
1850
1851    def show_multiple(self, widgets: list):
1852        """Shows multiple widgets at once, makes code a lot shorter because it unites several calls of the same function.
1853
1854        Args:
1855            widgets (list): Widgets who should be showed.
1856        """
1857        for widget in widgets:
1858            widget.show()
1859
1860
1861    def heightForWidth(self, width: float):
1862        """Computes height for a given width.
1863
1864        Args:
1865            width (float): Given width.
1866
1867        Returns:
1868            float: Computed height.
1869        """
1870        height_for_width_factor = 1.0 * 519 / 688
1871        return math.ceil(width * height_for_width_factor)
1872
1873
1874    def widthForHeight(self, height):
1875        """Computes width for a given height.
1876
1877        Args:
1878            height (float): Given height.
1879
1880        Returns:
1881            float: Computed width.
1882        """
1883        width_for_height_factor = 1.0 * 688 / 519
1884        return math.ceil(height * width_for_height_factor)
1885
1886
1887    def resizeEvent(self, event: QtGui.QResizeEvent):
1888        """Keeps the right aspect ratio of the graph visualisation image (or welcoming screen in the beginning) when window is resized.
1889
1890        Args:
1891            event (QtGui.QResizeEvent): Resize event.
1892        """
1893        super(MainWindow, self).resizeEvent(event)
1894        size = event.size()
1895        # window height minus height of all widgets below the label result in height of pixmap
1896        height = size.height() - self.save.height() - self.submit_molecule.height() - self.submit_exterior_nodes.height() - self.paths.height() - self.show_animation.height()
1897        if self.widthForHeight(height) > size.width(): # pixmap width should be as most as big as width of whole window
1898            width = size.width()
1899        else:
1900            width = self.widthForHeight(height)
1901        self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(width, height, QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
1902        self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(width, height, QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
class QHLine(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QFrame): 
29class QHLine(QFrame):
30    """Line Class that defines how separator lines look.
31    """
32    def __init__(self, mode: str):
33        super(QHLine, self).__init__()
34        self.setMinimumWidth(1)
35        self.setFixedHeight(1)
36        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
37        self.setFrameShadow(QFrame.Sunken)
38        self.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Preferred, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Minimum)
39        if mode == "single":
40            self.setStyleSheet("background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); color: rgb(191, 207, 255);")
41        elif mode == "multi":
42            self.setStyleSheet("background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); color: rgb(149, 221, 185);")

Line Class that defines how separator lines look.

QHLine(mode: str) 
32    def __init__(self, mode: str):
33        super(QHLine, self).__init__()
34        self.setMinimumWidth(1)
35        self.setFixedHeight(1)
36        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
37        self.setFrameShadow(QFrame.Sunken)
38        self.setSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Preferred, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Minimum)
39        if mode == "single":
40            self.setStyleSheet("background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); color: rgb(191, 207, 255);")
41        elif mode == "multi":
42            self.setStyleSheet("background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); color: rgb(149, 221, 185);")

class MainWindow(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow): 
  45class MainWindow(QMainWindow):
  46    """Main Window of the GUI. Inherits from class `QMainWindow`.
  47    """
  48    def __init__(self):
  49        """Initializes the main window.
  50        Main window contains a stacked layout with one window for single soliton case and one window for multi soliton case.
  51        Both display a welcoming text and all necessary widgets for the user to specify and submit a soliton graph.
  52        All other widgets are hidden for now and are revealed step by step, so user is guided through the use of the application.
  53        """
  54        super(MainWindow, self).__init__()
  55        self.setObjectName("MainWindow")
  56        # central widget is a stacked layout (so user can switch between the two different windows)
  57        self.central_wid = QtWidgets.QWidget()
  58        self.layout_for_wids = QtWidgets.QStackedLayout()
  59        self.central_wid.setStyleSheet("""background: white;""")
  60        # move window to the top of the screen + to the center horizontally
  61        qt_rectangle = self.frameGeometry()
  62        center_point = QtWidgets.QDesktopWidget().availableGeometry().center()
  63        qt_rectangle.moveCenter(center_point)
  64        self.move(qt_rectangle.topLeft().x(), 0)
  65        self.resize(QtCore.QSize(600, 680))
  66
  67
  68        # SOLITON AUTOMATON WIDGET
  69        self.wid_single = QtWidgets.QWidget()
  70        self.gridLayout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.wid_single)
  71        # Row 0:
  72        # Rectangle that displays the molecule
  73        self.display_molecule = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
  74        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored)
  75        self.display_molecule.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
  76        self.display_molecule.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(50, 37))
  77        startscreen = Startscreen().image
  78        self.qim = ImageQt(startscreen)
  79        self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
  80        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.display_molecule, 0, 0, 2, 5, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter|QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
  81        # Button that changes between the two windows
  82        self.change_window_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Switch Mode")
  83        self.change_window_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 20))
  84        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.change_window_button, 0, 0, 1, 1)
  85        self.change_window_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
  86        # "Mode" label
  87        self.mode = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
  88        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.mode, 0, 1, 1, 1)
  89        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 0
  90        self.row0 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
  91        self.minigrid0 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row0)
  92        self.minigrid0.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
  93        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row0, 0, 3, 1, 1)
  94        # Show Tips Checkbox
  95        self.show_tips = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Show Tips")
  96        self.show_tips.setChecked(True)
  97        self.minigrid0.addWidget(self.show_tips, 0, 0, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
  98        # Help button
  99        self.help_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("?")
 100        self.help_button.setFixedSize(QtCore.QSize(20, 20))
 101        self.minigrid0.addWidget(self.help_button, 0, 1, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 102        self.help_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 103        # Row 1: - (Image of molecule in row 0 stretches over 2 lines)
 104        # Row 2:
 105        # Label that displays short help/ a tip in the current status of the UI
 106        self.short_help = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 107        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 108        self.short_help.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 109        self.short_help.setStyleSheet("QLabel {color: rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
 110        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.short_help, 2, 0, 1, 5, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter)
 111        # Row 3:
 112        # "Traversal Mode" Checkbox
 113        self.traversal_mode = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Traversal Mode")
 114        self.traversal_mode.setChecked(False)
 115        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.traversal_mode, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 116        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 2
 117        self.row3 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 118        self.minigrid2 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row3)
 119        self.minigrid2.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 120        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row3, 3, 3, 1, 1)
 121        # Info button
 122        self.mol_info = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 123        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 124        self.mol_info.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 125        self.mol_info.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 126        self.minigrid2.addWidget(self.mol_info, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 127        # Save button for the molecule
 128        self.save = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 129        self.save.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
 130        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 131        self.save.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 132        self.save.setMaximumSize(QtCore.QSize(16777215, 32))
 133        self.save.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 134        self.minigrid2.addWidget(self.save, 3, 1, 1, 1)
 135        # Row 4:
 136        # "Molecule" label
 137        self.molecule_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 138        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.molecule_label, 4, 0, 1, 1)
 139        # Groupbox containg middle two elements of row 3
 140        self.row4 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 141        self.minigrid3 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row4)
 142        self.minigrid3.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 143        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row4, 4, 1, 1, 2)
 144        # Text field for molecule (combobox with a line edit)
 145        self.molecule_lineedit = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row4)
 146        try:
 147            with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 148                data = json.load(json_file)
 149        except:
 150            pass
 151        sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 152        for molecule in sorted_data: # Fill combobox with input strings from history
 153            self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 154        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.row4)
 155        self.molecule_lineedit.setLineEdit(edit)
 156        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
 157        self.molecule_lineedit.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
 158        self.molecule_lineedit.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
 159        self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().clear()
 160        self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(191, 207, 255);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 161        self.minigrid3.addWidget(self.molecule_lineedit, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 162        # Submit button for molecule
 163        self.submit_molecule = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 164        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 165        self.submit_molecule.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 166        self.submit_molecule.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 167        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.submit_molecule, 4, 3, 1, 1)
 168        # Parting line
 169        self.parting_line1 = QHLine("single")
 170        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.parting_line1, 5, 0, 1, 4)
 171        # Row 5: 
 172        # "Exterior nodes" label
 173        self.exterior_nodes_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 174        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.exterior_nodes_label, 6, 0, 1, 1)
 175        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 4
 176        self.row5 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 177        self.minigrid4 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row5)
 178        self.minigrid4.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 179        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row5, 6, 1, 1, 2)
 180        # "All" Checkbox
 181        self.all_exterior_nodes = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("All")
 182        self.all_exterior_nodes.setChecked(False)
 183        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.all_exterior_nodes, 6, 0, 1, 1)
 184        # Combobox to choose first exterior node
 185        self.node_1 = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5)
 186        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 187        self.node_1.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 188        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.node_1, 6, 1, 1, 1)
 189        # "&" label
 190        self.exterior_nodes_label2 = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.row5)
 191        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.exterior_nodes_label2, 6, 2, 1, 1)
 192        # Combobox to choose second exterior node
 193        self.node_2 = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5)
 194        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 195        self.node_2.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 196        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.node_2, 6, 3, 1, 1)
 197        # Submit button for exterior nodes
 198        self.submit_exterior_nodes = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 199        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 200        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 201        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 202        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.submit_exterior_nodes, 6, 3, 1, 1)
 203        # Parting line
 204        self.parting_line2 = QHLine("single")
 205        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.parting_line2, 7, 0, 1, 4)
 206        # Row 6:
 207        # "Soliton paths" label
 208        self.soliton_paths_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 209        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.soliton_paths_label, 8, 0, 1, 1)
 210        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 5
 211        self.row6 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 212        self.minigrid5 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row6)
 213        self.minigrid5.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 214        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 215        self.row6.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 216        self.row6.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 217        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row6, 8, 1, 1, 3)
 218        # Combobox to choose a soliton path
 219        self.paths = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row6)
 220        self.minigrid5.addWidget(self.paths, 8, 1, 1, 2)
 221        # Row 7:
 222        # "Show matrices" button
 223        self.show_matrices = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 224        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 225        self.show_matrices.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 226        self.show_matrices.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 227        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_matrices, 9, 1, 1, 1)
 228        # "Show end result" button
 229        self.show_end_result = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 230        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 231        self.show_end_result.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 232        self.show_end_result.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 233        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_end_result, 9, 2, 1, 1)
 234        # "Show animation" button
 235        self.show_animation = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
 236        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 237        self.show_animation.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 238        self.show_animation.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 239        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_animation, 9, 3, 1, 1)
 240        # Menubar:
 241        self.menubar = QtWidgets.QMenuBar(self)
 242        self.menubar.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 564, 24))
 243        self.setMenuBar(self.menubar)
 244
 245        # Function connections of different widgets:
 246        self.change_window_button.clicked.connect(self.change_window)
 247        self.show_tips.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.tips(self.show_tips))
 248        self.traversal_mode.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.change_mode(self.traversal_mode))
 249        self.mol_info.clicked.connect(self.mol_info_clicked)
 250        self.save.clicked.connect(self.save_clicked)
 251        self.help_button.clicked.connect(self.help_clicked)
 252        self.submit_molecule.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked)
 253        self.all_exterior_nodes.stateChanged.connect(self.all_exterior_nodes_statechanged)
 254        self.submit_exterior_nodes.clicked.connect(self.submit_exterior_nodes_clicked)
 255        self.show_matrices.clicked.connect(self.show_matrices_clicked)
 256        self.show_end_result.clicked.connect(self.show_end_result_clicked)
 257        self.show_animation.clicked.connect(lambda:self.show_animation_clicked(self.show_animation))
 258        # Hide most widgets at the beginning (while retaining space) 
 259        self.hide_retain_space([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 260        self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 261        # Stylesheet:
 262        readme_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), '../styles.css')
 263        with open(readme_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as fh:
 264            self.style = fh.read()
 265        self.wid_single.setStyleSheet(self.style)
 266
 267        self.status = 1 # What status the UI currently has (1: enter molecule, 2: choose exterior nodes, 3: investigate found paths)
 268
 269
 270        # MULTI-WAVE SOLITON AUTOMATON WIDGET
 271        self.wid_mult = QtWidgets.QWidget()
 272        self.gridLayout_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.wid_mult)
 273        # Row 0:
 274        # Rectangle that displays the molecule
 275        self.display_molecule_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 276        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored)
 277        self.display_molecule_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 278        self.display_molecule_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(50, 37))
 279        startscreen_m = Startscreen().image
 280        self.qim_m = ImageQt(startscreen_m)
 281        self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 282        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.display_molecule_m, 0, 0, 2, 5, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter|QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 283        # Button that changes between the two windows
 284        self.change_window_button_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Switch Mode")
 285        self.change_window_button_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 20))
 286        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.change_window_button_m, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 287        self.change_window_button_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 288        # "Mode" label
 289        self.mode_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 290        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.mode_m, 0, 1, 1, 1)
 291        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 0
 292        self.row0_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 293        self.minigrid0_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row0_m)
 294        self.minigrid0_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 295        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row0_m, 0, 3, 1, 1)
 296        # Show Tips Checkbox
 297        self.show_tips_m = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Show Tips")
 298        self.show_tips_m.setChecked(True)
 299        self.minigrid0_m.addWidget(self.show_tips_m, 0, 0, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 300        # Help button
 301        self.help_button_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton("?")
 302        self.help_button_m.setFixedSize(QtCore.QSize(20, 20))
 303        self.minigrid0_m.addWidget(self.help_button_m, 0, 1, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 304        self.help_button_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 305        # Row 1: - (Image of molecule in row 0 stretches over 2 lines)
 306        # Row 2:
 307        # Label that displays short help/ a tip in the current status of the UI
 308        self.short_help_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 309        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 310        self.short_help_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 311        self.short_help_m.setStyleSheet("QLabel {color: rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 312        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.short_help_m, 2, 0, 1, 5, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter)
 313        # Row 3:
 314        # "Traversal Mode" Checkbox
 315        self.traversal_mode_m = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Traversal Mode")
 316        self.traversal_mode_m.setChecked(False)
 317        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.traversal_mode_m, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 318        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 2
 319        self.row3_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 320        self.minigrid2_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row3_m)
 321        self.minigrid2_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 322        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row3_m, 3, 3, 1, 1)
 323        # Info button
 324        self.mol_info_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.row3_m)
 325        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 326        self.mol_info_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 327        self.mol_info_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 328        self.minigrid2_m.addWidget(self.mol_info_m, 3, 0, 1, 1)
 329        # Save button for the molecule
 330        self.save_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.row3_m)
 331        self.save_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 332        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 333        self.save_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 334        self.save_m.setMaximumSize(QtCore.QSize(16777215, 32))
 335        self.save_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 336        self.minigrid2_m.addWidget(self.save_m, 3, 1, 1, 1)
 337        # Row 4:
 338        # "Molecule" label
 339        self.molecule_label_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 340        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.molecule_label_m, 4, 0, 1, 1)
 341        # Text field for molecule (combobox with a line edit)
 342        self.molecule_lineedit_m = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.wid_mult)
 343        try:
 344            with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 345                data = json.load(json_file)
 346        except:
 347            pass
 348        sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 349        for molecule in sorted_data:
 350            self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 351        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.wid_mult)
 352        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setLineEdit(edit)
 353        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
 354        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
 355        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
 356        self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().clear()
 357        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 358        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.molecule_lineedit_m, 4, 1, 1, 2)
 359        # Submit button for molecule
 360        self.submit_molecule_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 361        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 362        self.submit_molecule_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 363        self.submit_molecule_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 364        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_molecule_m, 4, 3, 1, 1)
 365        # Parting line
 366        self.parting_line1_m = QHLine("multi")
 367        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line1_m, 5, 0, 1, 4)
 368        # Row 5: 
 369        # "Set of bursts" label
 370        self.set_of_bursts_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 371        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.set_of_bursts_label, 6, 0, 1, 1)
 372        # Groupbox containg middle two elements of row 4
 373        self.row5_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 374        self.minigrid4_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row5_m)
 375        self.minigrid4_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 376        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row5_m, 6, 1, 1, 2)
 377        # Text field for set of bursts (combobox with a line edit)
 378        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5_m)
 379        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.row5_m)
 380        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setLineEdit(edit)
 381        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
 382        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
 383        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
 384        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 385        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.set_of_bursts_lineedit, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 386        # Submit button for set of bursts
 387        self.submit_set_of_bursts = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 388        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 389        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 390        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 391        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_set_of_bursts, 6, 3, 1, 1)
 392        # Parting line
 393        self.parting_line2_m = QHLine("multi")
 394        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line2_m, 7, 0, 1, 4)
 395        # Row 6:
 396        # "Bursts" label
 397        self.bursts_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 398        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.bursts_label, 8, 0, 1, 1)
 399        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 5
 400        self.row6_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 401        self.minigrid4_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row6_m)
 402        self.minigrid4_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 403        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row6_m, 8, 1, 1, 2)
 404        # "All" checkbox
 405        self.all_bursts = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("All")
 406        self.all_bursts.setChecked(False)
 407        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.all_bursts, 8, 0, 1, 1)
 408        # Combobox to choose burst
 409        self.burst = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row6_m)
 410        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 411        self.burst.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 412        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.burst, 8, 1, 1, 1)
 413        # Submit button for burst
 414        self.submit_burst = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 415        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 416        self.submit_burst.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 417        self.submit_burst.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 418        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_burst, 8, 3, 1, 1)
 419        # Parting line
 420        self.parting_line3_m = QHLine("multi")
 421        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line3_m, 9, 0, 1, 4)
 422        # Row 7:
 423        # "Traversals" label
 424        self.traversals_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
 425        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.traversals_label, 10, 0, 1, 1)
 426        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 6
 427        self.row7_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 428        self.minigrid6_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row7_m)
 429        self.minigrid6_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 430        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 431        self.row7_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 432        self.row7_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 433        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row7_m, 10, 1, 1, 3)
 434        # Combobox to choose a traversal
 435        self.traversals = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row7_m)
 436        self.minigrid6_m.addWidget(self.traversals, 10, 1, 1, 2)
 437        # Row 8:
 438        # "Show matrices" button
 439        self.show_matrices_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 440        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 441        self.show_matrices_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 442        self.show_matrices_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 443        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_matrices_m, 11, 1, 1, 1)
 444        # "Show end result" button
 445        self.show_end_result_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 446        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 447        self.show_end_result_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 448        self.show_end_result_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 449        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_end_result_m, 11, 2, 1, 1)
 450        # "Show animation" button
 451        self.show_animation_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
 452        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
 453        self.show_animation_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 454        self.show_animation_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
 455        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_animation_m, 11, 3, 1, 1)
 456
 457        # Function connections of different widgets:
 458        self.change_window_button_m.clicked.connect(self.change_window)
 459        self.show_tips_m.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.tips_m(self.show_tips_m))
 460        self.traversal_mode_m.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.change_mode_m(self.traversal_mode_m))
 461        self.mol_info_m.clicked.connect(self.mol_info_clicked_m)
 462        self.save_m.clicked.connect(self.save_clicked_m)
 463        self.help_button_m.clicked.connect(self.help_clicked_m)
 464        self.all_bursts.stateChanged.connect(self.all_bursts_statechanged)
 465        self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked_m)
 466        self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.connect(self.submit_set_of_bursts_clicked)
 467        self.submit_burst.clicked.connect(self.submit_burst_clicked)
 468        self.show_matrices_m.clicked.connect(self.show_matrices_clicked_m)
 469        self.show_end_result_m.clicked.connect(self.show_end_result_clicked_m)
 470        self.show_animation_m.clicked.connect(lambda:self.show_animation_clicked(self.show_animation_m))
 471        # Hide most widgets at the beginning (while retaining space)
 472        self.hide_retain_space([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 473        self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 474        # Stylesheet:
 475        readme_path_m = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), '../styles_m.css')
 476        with open(readme_path_m, "r", encoding="utf-8") as fh_m:
 477            self.style_m = fh_m.read()
 478        self.wid_mult.setStyleSheet(self.style_m)
 479
 480        self.status_m = 1 # What status the multiwave UI currently has (1: enter molecule, 2: enter burst, 3: choose burst(s), 4: investigate found paths)
 481
 482
 483        # Add both widgets to stacked layout, default widget when starting the software is single soliton case widget
 484        self.layout_for_wids.addWidget(self.wid_single)
 485        self.layout_for_wids.addWidget(self.wid_mult)
 486        self.central_wid.setLayout(self.layout_for_wids)
 487        self.setCentralWidget(self.central_wid)
 488        self.front_wid = 1
 489        self.retranslateUi()
 490        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(self)
 491
 492
 493    def retranslateUi(self):
 494        """Implements multi-language suppport. Is generated automatically when using PyQt5 UI code generator.
 495        """
 496        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
 497        self.setWindowTitle(_translate("MainWindow", "Soliton Automata Software"))
 498        self.mode.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Single-Wave Mode"))
 499        self.short_help.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu"))
 500        self.mol_info.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Info"))
 501        self.molecule_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Molecule:"))
 502        self.submit_molecule.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose molecule"))
 503        self.exterior_nodes_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Exterior nodes:"))
 504        self.exterior_nodes_label2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "&"))
 505        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose nodes"))
 506        self.soliton_paths_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Soliton paths:"))
 507        self.show_matrices.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show matrices"))
 508        self.show_end_result.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show end result"))
 509        self.show_animation.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show animation"))
 510
 511        self.mode_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Multi-Wave Mode"))
 512        self.short_help_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu"))
 513        self.mol_info_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Info"))
 514        self.molecule_label_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Molecule:"))
 515        self.submit_molecule_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose molecule"))
 516        self.set_of_bursts_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Set of bursts:"))
 517        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose bursts"))
 518        self.bursts_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Bursts:"))
 519        self.submit_burst.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Select burst(s)"))
 520        self.traversals_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Sets of paths:"))
 521        self.show_matrices_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show matrices"))
 522        self.show_end_result_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show end result"))
 523        self.show_animation_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show animation"))
 524
 525
 526    def change_window(self):
 527        """Is called when "Change Mode" button is clicked. Changes between the two widgets of the stacked layout.
 528        """
 529        if self.front_wid == 1:
 530            self.layout_for_wids.setCurrentIndex(1)
 531            self.front_wid = 2
 532        else:
 533            self.layout_for_wids.setCurrentIndex(0)
 534            self.front_wid = 1
 535
 536
 537    def change_mode(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 538        """Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in single soliton widget.
 539        In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph.
 540        When in traversal mode, the input molecule can't be edited.
 541
 542        Args:
 543            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.
 544        """
 545        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 546            # make text field uneditable and button unclickable, turn both objects grey to make those properties visually recognizable
 547            self.submit_molecule.clicked.disconnect()
 548            self.submit_molecule.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
 549            self.molecule_lineedit.setEnabled(False)
 550            self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 551            self.molecule_label.setText("Original molecule:")
 552        else:
 553            self.submit_molecule.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked)
 554            self.submit_molecule.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
 555            self.molecule_lineedit.setEnabled(True)
 556            self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(191, 207, 255);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
