 557            self.molecule_label.setText("Molecule:")
 558            self.submit_molecule_clicked()
 559
 560    
 561    def change_mode_m(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 562        """Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in multi soliton widget.
 563        In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph.
 564        When in traversal mode, the input molecule and the set of bursts can't be edited.
 565
 566        Args:
 567            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.
 568        """
 569        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 570            # make text field uneditable and button unclickable, turn both objects grey to make those properties visually recognizable
 571            self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.disconnect()
 572            self.submit_molecule_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
 573            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setEnabled(False)
 574            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 575            self.molecule_label_m.setText("Original molecule:")
 576            self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.disconnect()
 577            self.submit_set_of_bursts.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
 578            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setEnabled(False)
 579            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 580        else:
 581            self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked_m)
 582            self.submit_molecule_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 583            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setEnabled(True)
 584            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 585            self.molecule_label_m.setText("Molecule:")
 586            self.submit_molecule_clicked_m()
 587            self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.connect(self.submit_set_of_bursts_clicked)
 588            self.submit_set_of_bursts.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
 589            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setEnabled(True)
 590            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
 591
 592
 593    def tips(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 594        """Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in single soliton widget.
 595
 596        Args:
 597            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox
 598        """
 599        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 600            self.short_help.show()
 601        else:
 602            self.hide_retain_space([self.short_help])
 603            self.short_help.hide()
 604
 605
 606    def tips_m(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
 607        """Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in multi soliton widget.
 608
 609        Args:
 610            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox
 611        """
 612        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
 613            self.short_help_m.show()
 614        else:
 615            self.hide_retain_space([self.short_help_m])
 616            self.short_help_m.hide()
 617
 618
 619    def help_clicked(self):
 620        """Is called when "?" button is clicked in single soliton widget.
 621        Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.
 622        """
 623        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 624        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 625        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 626        grid.addWidget(label, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 627
 628        if self.status == 1:
 629            text = f"Please now enter a molecule behind \"Molecule: \"."
 630            text = text + f"This is how you define one: \n"
 631            text = text + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 632            text = text + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 633            text = text + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 634            text = text + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 635            text = text + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 636            text = text + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')\n\n"
 637            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose molecule\"."
 638            label.setText(text)
 639        elif self.status == 2:
 640            text = f"Please now choose exterior nodes. \n"
 641            text = text + f"If you check \"All\", soliton paths between all pairs of the graph's exterior nodes are displayed. \n"
 642            text = text + f"Alternatively, you can choose two exterior nodes. \n"
 643            text = text + f"The software will then only give you paths between the first and the second exterior node. \n"
 644            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose nodes\". \n\n"
 645            text = text + f"You can also save the soliton graph with the save-button on the right. \n"
 646            text = text + f"Determinism properties and possible impervious paths can be investigated by clicking on \"Info\"."
 647            label.setText(text)
 648        elif self.status == 3:
 649            text = f"Please choose a soliton path from the drop-down menu. \n"
 650            text = text + f"Each of the 3 buttons in the lower row will open a pop-up window with certain information. \n"
 651            text = text + f"Clicking on \"Choose matrices\" will display the adjacency matrices of every timestep of the soliton's traversal. \n"
 652            text = text + f"\"Show end result\" will show the resulting soliton graph after the traversal of the chosen path. \n"
 653            text = text + f"In this window, you can click \"Use\", which will put the software in traversal mode. \n"
 654            text = text + f"Traversal mode let's you use the resulting soliton graph as the new state of the soliton automaton. \n"
 655            text = text + f"You will see that this mode locks the editing of the molecule textbox. \n"
 656            text = text + f"It gives you the possibility to choose exterior nodes to then compute paths in this new state. \n"
 657            text = text + f"By clicking \"Show animation\" an animation visualising the traversal of the chosen path will be played."
 658            label.setText(text)
 659
 660        dlg.setWindowTitle("Help")
 661        dlg.exec_()
 662
 663
 664    def help_clicked_m(self):
 665        """Is called when "?" button is clicked in multi soliton widget.
 666        Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.
 667        """
 668        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 669        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 670        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 671        grid.addWidget(label, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 672
 673        if self.status_m == 1:
 674            text = f"Please now enter a molecule behind \"Molecule: \"."
 675            text = text + f"This is how you define one: \n"
 676            text = text + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 677            text = text + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 678            text = text + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 679            text = text + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 680            text = text + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 681            text = text + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')\n\n"
 682            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose molecule\"."
 683            label.setText(text)
 684        elif self.status_m == 2:
 685            text = f"Please now enter a set of bursts."
 686            text = f"This is how you define one: \n"
 687            text = text + f"- Starting and end node of a soliton are embedded in round brackets (e.g. (3, 2))\n"
 688            text = text + f"- Solitons are seperated by '||'\n"
 689            text = text + f"- The number in front of a soliton's pair of exterior nodes defines how many timesteps later than the previous soliton this soliton enters the graph\n"
 690            text = text + f"- A set of bursts is embedded in braces, where individual bursts are seperated by ';'\n"
 691            text = text + "- Example: " + "{(3,1)||1(1,2); (3,2)||4(2,1)}\n"
 692            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose bursts\". \n\n"
 693            text = text + f"You can also save the soliton graph with the save-button on the right."
 694            label.setText(text)
 695        elif self.status_m == 3:
 696            text = f"Please now choose a burst. \n"
 697            text = text + f"If you check \"All\", configuration trails for all bursts are displayed. \n"
 698            text = text + f"Alternatively, you can choose a specific burst. \n"
 699            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Select burst(s)\". \n\n"
 700            text = text + f"The soliton automaton's determinism properties can be investigated by clicking on \"Info\"."
 701            label.setText(text)
 702        elif self.status_m == 4:
 703            text = f"Please choose a configuration trail from the drop-down menu. \n"
 704            text = text + f"Configuration trails are displayed as a set of paths, where each path is marked with \"S\" and a number (e.g. \"S1\" for the first soliton). \n\n"
 705            text = text + f"Each of the 3 buttons in the lower row will open a pop-up window with certain information. \n"
 706            text = text + f"Clicking on \"Choose matrices\" will display the adjacency matrices of every timestep of the solitons' traversal. \n"
 707            text = text + f"\"Show end result\" will show the resulting soliton graph after the traversal of the chosen configuration trail. \n"
 708            text = text + f"In this window, you can click \"Use\", which will put the software in traversal mode. \n"
 709            text = text + f"Traversal mode let's you use the resulting soliton graph as the new state of the soliton automaton. \n"
 710            text = text + f"You will see that this mode locks the editing of the molecule and the set of bursts textboxes. \n"
 711            text = text + f"It gives you the possibility to choose bursts from the entered set to then compute configuration trails in this new state. \n"
 712            text = text + f"By clicking \"Show animation\" an animation visualising the traversal of the chosen configuration trail will be played."
 713            label.setText(text)
 714
 715        dlg.setWindowTitle("Help")
 716        dlg.exec_()
 717
 718
 719    def submit_molecule_clicked(self):
 720        """Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in single soliton widget.
 721        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.
 722        If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation,
 723        an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to choose exterior nodes.
 724        """
 725        self.node_1.clear()
 726        self.node_2.clear()
 727        self.smiles_string = self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
 728        try:
 729            # Try creating a soliton graph out of the entered molecule. Fails if the syntax is wrong.
 730            self.my_graph = SolitonGraph(self.smiles_string)
 731            errors = self.my_graph.validate_soliton_graph()
 732            self.automaton = SolitonAutomaton(self.my_graph)
 733            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.my_graph.bindings, False, True)
 734            self.qim = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
 735            self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 736            if errors != []:
 737                # Case in which the specified molecule is not a soliton graph. User will be provided with information which are the exact problems that make the molecule no soliton graph.
 738                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 739                self.status = 1
 740                self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 741                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
 742                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
 743                msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton graph")
 744                msg.setText("You specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.")
 745                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 746                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 747                msg.setInformativeText("See details for all incorrect parts of your molecule.")
 748                details = ""
 749                for i, error in enumerate(errors):
 750                    if i == len(errors) - 1:
 751                        details = details + f"- {error}"
 752                    else:
 753                        details = details + f"- {error}" + "\n"
 754                msg.setDetailedText(details)
 755                x = msg.exec_() # show messagebox
 756            elif self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_name_collision() == True:
 757                # Case in which two or more exterior nodes got assigned the same name.
 758                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 759                self.status = 1
 760                self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 761                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
 762                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 763                msg.setWindowTitle("Name collision")
 764                msg.setText("You specified two or more exterior nodes with the same name.")
 765                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 766                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 767                x = msg.exec_()
 768            else:
 769                # Case in which a valid soliton graph was specified. User is now able to specify pair(s) of exterior nodes.
 770                self.show_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes])
 771                self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 772                self.status = 2
 773                self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
 774                for key in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse:
 775                    self.node_1.addItem(key)
 776                    self.node_2.addItem(key)
 777        except:
 778            # No soliton graph could be created, so input syntax is wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
 779            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
 780            self.status = 1
 781            self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 782            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
 783            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 784            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
 785            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
 786            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 787            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 788            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
 789            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a molecule: \n"
 790            details = details + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 791            details = details + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 792            details = details + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 793            details = details + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 794            details = details + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 795            details = details + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')"
 796            msg.setDetailedText(details)
 797            x = msg.exec_()
 798        # Edit json file if input string was turned into a soliton graph successfully
 799        if self.status == 2:
 800            try:
 801                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 802                    data = json.load(json_file)
 803            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
 804                data = []
 805            
 806            # Check if input string already exists in the data
 807            existing_molecule = next((m for m in data if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string), None)
 808            if existing_molecule:
 809                existing_molecule["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") # If the molecule exists, update "last_used"
 810            else: # If the molecule doesn't exist, add a new molecule
 811                molecule = {
 812                    "input_string": self.smiles_string,
 813                    "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
 814                    "sets_of_bursts": [
 815                    ]
 816                }
 817                data.append(molecule)
 818
 819            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
 820                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
 821
 822            # Change combobox items so that entered molecule (which is now the last used molecule) is the first element in the comboboxes of both windows
 823            sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 824            self.molecule_lineedit.clear()
 825            current_molecule_m = self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().text() # Save current text of line edit in multiwave window to add it again later
 826            self.molecule_lineedit_m.clear()
 827            for molecule in sorted_data:
 828                self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 829                self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 830            self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().setText(current_molecule_m)
 831
 832
 833    def submit_molecule_clicked_m(self):
 834        """Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in multi soliton widget.
 835        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.
 836        If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation,
 837        an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to specify a set of bursts and a stop number.
 838        """
 839        self.smiles_string_m = self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().text()
 840        try:
 841            # Try creating a soliton graph out of the entered molecule. Fails if the syntax is wrong.
 842            self.my_graph_m = SolitonGraph(self.smiles_string_m)
 843            errors = self.my_graph_m.validate_soliton_graph()
 844            self.graph_pic_m = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph_m, self.my_graph_m.bindings, False, True)
 845            self.qim_m = ImageQt(self.graph_pic_m)
 846            self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 847            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
 848            if errors != []:
 849                # Case in which the specified molecule is not a soliton graph. User will be provided with information which are the exact problems that make the molecule no soliton graph.
 850                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 851                self.status_m = 1
 852                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 853                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
 854                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 855                msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton graph")
 856                msg.setText("You specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.")
 857                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 858                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 859                msg.setInformativeText("See details for all incorrect parts of your molecule.")
 860                details = ""
 861                for i, error in enumerate(errors):
 862                    if i == len(errors) - 1:
 863                        details = details + f"- {error}"
 864                    else:
 865                        details = details + f"- {error}" + "\n"
 866                msg.setDetailedText(details)
 867                x = msg.exec_() # show messagebox
 868            elif self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_name_collision() == True:
 869                # Case in which two or more exterior nodes got assigned the same name.
 870                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 871                self.status_m = 1
 872                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 873                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
 874                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 875                msg.setWindowTitle("Name collision")
 876                msg.setText("You specified two or more exterior nodes with the same name.")
 877                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 878                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 879                x = msg.exec_()
 880            else:
 881                # Case in which a valid soliton graph was specified. User is now able to specify a set of bursts.
 882                self.show_multiple([self.save_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts])
 883                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 884                self.status_m = 2
 885                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a set of bursts or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 886        except:
 887            # No soliton graph could be created, so input syntax is wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
 888            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.mol_info_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
 889            self.status_m = 1
 890            self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
 891            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
 892            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
 893            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
 894            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
 895            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
 896            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
 897            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
 898            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a molecule: \n"
 899            details = details + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
 900            details = details + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
 901            details = details + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
 902            details = details + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
 903            details = details + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
 904            details = details + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')"
 905            msg.setDetailedText(details)
 906            x = msg.exec_()
 907        # Edit json file if input string was turned into a soliton graph successfully
 908        if self.status_m == 2:
 909            try:
 910                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
 911                    data = json.load(json_file)
 912            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
 913                data = []
 914            
 915            # Check if input string already exists in the data
 916            existing_molecule = next((m for m in data if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string_m), None)
 917            if existing_molecule:
 918                existing_molecule["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") # If the molecule exists, update "last_used"
 919            else: # If the molecule doesn't exist, add a new molecule
 920                molecule = {
 921                    "input_string": self.smiles_string_m,
 922                    "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
 923                    "sets_of_bursts": [
 924                    ]
 925                }
 926                existing_molecule = molecule
 927                data.append(molecule)
 928
 929            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
 930                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
 931
 932            # Change combobox items so that entered molecule (which is now the last used molecule) is the first element in the comboboxes of both windows
 933            sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 934            self.molecule_lineedit_m.clear()
 935            current_molecule = self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
 936            self.molecule_lineedit.clear()
 937            for molecule in sorted_data:
 938                self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 939                self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
 940            self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().setText(current_molecule)
 941
 942            # Add all set of bursts from history of the current molecule
 943            sorted_burstsets = sorted(existing_molecule["sets_of_bursts"], key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
 944            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
 945            for burstset in sorted_burstsets:
 946                self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.addItem(burstset["set_of_bursts"])
 947            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.lineEdit().clear()
 948
 949
 950    def mol_info_clicked(self):
 951        """Is called when "Info" button in single soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether
 952        the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic and reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism and all impervious paths.
 953        """
 954
 955        def save_info():
 956            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all info on soliton automaton/ soliton graph should be saved.
 957            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule.
 958            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
 959            """
 960            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
 961            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'info.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
 962            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
 963                path = name[0]
 964                file = open(path, "w")
 965                file.write(txt_text)
 966                file.close()
 967        
 968        txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.smiles_string} \n\n"
 969        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 970        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 971        # Deterministic
 972        label_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 973        label_det.setText("Deterministic:")
 974        txt_text = txt_text + f"Deterministic: "
 975        grid.addWidget(label_det, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 976        det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 977        if self.automaton.deterministic:
 978            det_bool.setText("Yes")
 979            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
 980        else: 
 981            det_bool.setText("No")
 982            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
 983        grid.addWidget(det_bool, 0, 1, 1, 1)
 984        # Strongly deterministic
 985        label_strong_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 986        label_strong_det.setText("Strongly deterministic:")
 987        txt_text = txt_text + f"Strongly deterministic: "
 988        grid.addWidget(label_strong_det, 1, 0, 1, 1)
 989        strong_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 990        if self.automaton.strongly_deterministic:
 991            strong_det_bool.setText("Yes")
 992            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
 993        else: 
 994            strong_det_bool.setText("No")
 995            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
 996        grid.addWidget(strong_det_bool, 1, 1, 1, 1)
 997        # Reachability-deterministic
 998        label_reach_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 999        label_reach_det.setText("Reachability-deterministic:")
1000        txt_text = txt_text + f"Reachability-deterministic: "
1001        grid.addWidget(label_reach_det, 2, 0, 1, 1)
1002        reach_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1003        if self.automaton.reachability_deterministic:
1004            reach_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1005            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1006        else: 
1007            reach_det_bool.setText("No")
1008            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1009        grid.addWidget(reach_det_bool, 2, 1, 1, 1)
1010        # Degree of non-determinism
1011        label_degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1012        label_degree.setText("Degree of non-determinism:")
1013        txt_text = txt_text + f"Degree of non-determinism: "
1014        grid.addWidget(label_degree, 3, 0, 1, 1)
1015        degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1016        degree.setText(str(self.automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism))
1017        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism} \n"
1018        grid.addWidget(degree, 3, 1, 1, 1)
1019        # Impervious paths
1020        label_imp_paths = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1021        label_imp_paths.setText("Impervious path(s):")
1022        txt_text = txt_text + f"Impervious path(s): "
1023        grid.addWidget(label_imp_paths, 4, 0, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1024        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1025        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1026        save_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
1027        grid.addWidget(save_button, 5, 1, 1, 1)
1028        save_button.clicked.connect(save_info)
1029        group = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
1030        layout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(group)
1031        layout.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
1032        impervs = self.automaton.find_impervious_paths()
1033        if impervs == []:
1034            layout.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel("-"))
1035            txt_text = txt_text + f"-"
1036        for i, path in enumerate(impervs):
1037            layout.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(path), i, 0, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1038            txt_text = txt_text + f"{path}"
1039            if i != len(impervs)-1:
1040                txt_text = txt_text + f", "
1041        grid.addWidget(group, 4, 1, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1042        dlg.setWindowTitle("Info")
1043        dlg.exec_()
1044
1045    
1046    def mol_info_clicked_m(self):
1047        """Is called when "Info" button in multi soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether
1048        the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic, reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism.
1049        """
1050
1051        def save_info():
1052            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all info on soliton automaton/ soliton graph should be saved.
1053            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule.
1054            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1055            """
1056            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1057            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'info.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1058            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1059                path = name[0]
1060                file = open(path, "w")
1061                file.write(txt_text)
1062                file.close()
1063        
1064        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1065        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
1066        label_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1067        txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.smiles_string_m} \n"
1068        txt_text = txt_text + f"Set of bursts: {self.bursts} \n\n"
1069        label_det.setText("Deterministic:")
1070        txt_text = txt_text + f"Deterministic: "
1071        grid.addWidget(label_det, 0, 0, 1, 1)
1072        det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1073        if self.multi_automaton.deterministic:
1074            det_bool.setText("Yes")
1075            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1076        else: 
1077            det_bool.setText("No")
1078            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1079        grid.addWidget(det_bool, 0, 1, 1, 1)
1080        label_strong_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1081        label_strong_det.setText("Strongly deterministic:")
1082        txt_text = txt_text + f"Strongly deterministic: "
1083        grid.addWidget(label_strong_det, 1, 0, 1, 1)
1084        strong_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1085        if self.multi_automaton.strongly_deterministic:
1086            strong_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1087            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1088        else: 
1089            strong_det_bool.setText("No")
1090            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1091        grid.addWidget(strong_det_bool, 1, 1, 1, 1)
1092
1093        label_reach_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1094        label_reach_det.setText("Reachability-deterministic:")
1095        txt_text = txt_text + f"Reachability-deterministic: "
1096        grid.addWidget(label_reach_det, 2, 0, 1, 1)
1097        reach_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1098        if self.multi_automaton.reachability_deterministic:
1099            reach_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1100            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1101        else: 
1102            reach_det_bool.setText("No")
1103            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1104        grid.addWidget(reach_det_bool, 2, 1, 1, 1)
1105
1106        label_degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1107        label_degree.setText("Degree of non-determinism:")
1108        txt_text = txt_text + f"Degree of non-determinism: "
1109        grid.addWidget(label_degree, 3, 0, 1, 1)
1110        degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1111        degree.setText(str(self.multi_automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism))
1112        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.multi_automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism} \n"
1113        grid.addWidget(degree, 3, 1, 1, 1)
1114
1115        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1116        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1117        save_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
1118        grid.addWidget(save_button, 4, 1, 1, 1)
1119        save_button.clicked.connect(save_info)
1120        dlg.setWindowTitle("Info")
1121        dlg.exec_()
1122
1123
1124    def save_clicked(self):
1125        """Is called when user clicks button to save the graph visualisation in single soliton widget.
1126        Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the image should be saved.
1127        Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1128        """
1129        option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1130        name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'graph.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1131        if name != ('', ''):
1132            path = name[0]
1133            # turn PIL Image into byte array 
1134            imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1135            self.graph_pic.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1136            imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1137            # save image at specified path
1138            file = open(path, "wb")
1139            file.write(imgByteArr)
1140            file.close()
1141
1142
1143    def save_clicked_m(self):
1144        """Is called when user clicks button to save the graph visualisation in multi soliton widget.
1145        Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the image should be saved.
1146        Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1147        """
1148        option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1149        name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_mult, 'Save File', 'graph.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1150        if name != ('', ''):
1151            path = name[0] 
1152            imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1153            self.graph_pic_m.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1154            imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1155            file = open(path, "wb")
1156            file.write(imgByteArr)
1157            file.close()
1158
1159    
1160    def submit_set_of_bursts_clicked(self):
1161        """Is called when user clicks button to submit a set of bursts.
1162        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax.
1163        If the user's set of bursts is valid it displays all the necessary widgets for the user to choose a burst.
1164        """
1165        bursts = self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
1166        self.bursts = bursts
1167        self.burst.clear()
1168        try:
1169            # Try creating a multi soliton automaton with the graph and the entered set of bursts. Fails if syntax of set of bursts is wrong.
1170            self.multi_automaton = MultiwaveSolitonAutomaton(self.my_graph_m, bursts)
1171            bursts = bursts.split(";")
1172            for burst in bursts:
1173                burst = re.sub(r"[{}]+", "", burst)
1174                self.burst.addItem(burst)
1175            self.show_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst])
1176            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1177            self.status_m = 3
1178            self.short_help_m.setText("Choose a burst or use all bursts in the set of bursts for finding paths")
1179        except:
1180            # Case in which syntax was wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
1181            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1182            self.status_m = 2
1183            self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a set of bursts or choose one from the drop-down menu")
1184            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
1185            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
1186            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
1187            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
1188            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
1189            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
1190            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
1191            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a set of bursts: \n"
1192            details = details + f"- Starting and end node of a soliton are embedded in round brackets (e.g. (3, 2))\n"
1193            details = details + f"- Solitons are seperated by '||'\n"
1194            details = details + f"- The number in front of a soliton's pair of exterior nodes defines how many timesteps later than the previous soliton this soliton enters the graph\n"
1195            details = details + f"- A set of bursts is embedded in braces, where individual bursts are seperated by ';'\n"
1196            details = details + "- Example: " + "{(3,1)||1(1,2); (3,2)||4(2,1)}\n"
1197            msg.setDetailedText(details)
1198            x = msg.exec_()
1199        if self.status_m == 3:
1200            try:
1201                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
1202                    data = json.load(json_file)
1203            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
1204                data = []
1205            
1206            # Look for the current molecule in the data
1207            index_of_molecule = next((i for i, m in enumerate(data) if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string_m), None)
1208            if index_of_molecule is not None:
1209                existing_burst = next((b for b in data[index_of_molecule]["sets_of_bursts"] if b["set_of_bursts"] == self.bursts), None)
1210
1211                if existing_burst: # If the set of bursts exists, update the "last_used" field
1212                    existing_burst["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
1213                else: # If the set of bursts doesn't exist, add a new object to the "sets_of_bursts" list
1214                    burst_data = {
1215                        "set_of_bursts": self.bursts,
1216                        "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
1217                    }
1218                    data[index_of_molecule]["sets_of_bursts"].append(burst_data)
1219
1220            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
1221                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
1222
1223            # Change combobox items so that entered set of bursts (which is now the last used set of bursts) is the first element in the combobox
1224            sorted_burstsets = sorted(data[index_of_molecule]["sets_of_bursts"], key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
1225            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
1226            for burstset in sorted_burstsets:
1227                self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.addItem(burstset["set_of_bursts"])
1228
1229
1230    def all_exterior_nodes_statechanged(self):
1231        """Is called when "All" checkbox in single soliton widget is checked/ unchecked.
1232        Hides/ unhides widgets to choose a pair of exterior nodes.
1233        """
1234        if self.all_exterior_nodes.isChecked():
1235            self.hide_multiple([self.node_1, self.exterior_nodes_label2, self.node_2])
1236        else: self.show_multiple([self.node_1, self.exterior_nodes_label2, self.node_2])
1237
1238
1239    def all_bursts_statechanged(self):
1240        """Is called when "All" checkbox in multi soliton widget is checked/ unchecked.
1241        Hides/ unhides widgets to choose a burst.
1242        """
1243        if self.all_bursts.isChecked():
1244            self.burst.hide()
1245        else: self.burst.show()
1246
1247
1248    def submit_exterior_nodes_clicked(self):
1249        """Is called when user clicks button to submit exterior nodes.
1250        Displays all possible soliton paths between the two chosen nodes/ all pairs of exterior nodes.
1251        Informs the user if no soliton path exists between them.
1252        Otherwise all the necessary widgets for the user to choose a computed soliton path and look at further information on it are revealed.
1253        """
1254        self.path_index = None # we need this variable later in show_animation_clicked
1255        self.paths.clear()
1256        if self.all_exterior_nodes.isChecked(): # User wants to see all soliton paths between all pairs of exterior nodes
1257            key = self.automaton.matrix_to_string(nx.to_numpy_array(self.my_graph.graph))
1258            self.found_paths = self.automaton.states_plus_soliton_paths[key][1]
1259        else: # User selected a specific pair of exterior nodes
1260            node1 = self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse[self.node_1.currentText()]
1261            node2 = self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse[self.node_2.currentText()]
1262            self.found_paths = self.automaton.call_find_all_paths_given_nodes(node1, node2, self.my_graph)
1263        if self.found_paths == []: # No paths were found
1264            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
1265            self.status = 2
1266            self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
1267            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
1268            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
1269            msg.setWindowTitle("No path found")
1270            msg.setText("There exists no soliton path between these exterior nodes.")
1271            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Information)
1272            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
1273            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with different exterior nodes or a different soliton automaton.")
1274            x = msg.exec_()
1275        else: # Paths were found and are now added to combobox
1276            self.incomplete_paths_indices = []
1277            for p, soliton_path in enumerate(self.found_paths):
1278                if isinstance(soliton_path, SolitonPath): # if soliton path is a real soliton path and no incomplete path were search was terminated
1279                    self.paths.addItem(str(soliton_path.path_for_user))
1280                else:
1281                    self.incomplete_paths_indices.append(p)
1282            self.found_paths = [i for j, i in enumerate(self.found_paths) if j not in self.incomplete_paths_indices] # Need to display the right number of paths
1283            self.soliton_paths_label.setText(f"Soliton paths ({len(self.found_paths)}):")
1284            self.show_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
1285            self.status = 3
1286            self.short_help.setText("Select a soliton path and investigate it further")
1287
1288    
1289    def submit_burst_clicked(self):
1290        """Is called when user clicks button to submit burst(s).
1291        Displays all possible traversals for the chosen burst/ all bursts.
1292        Informs the user if no traversals exists for it/ them.
1293        Otherwise all the necessary widgets for the user to choose a computed traversals and look at further information on it are revealed.
1294        """
1295        self.traversal_index = None # we need this variable later in show_animation_clicked
1296        self.traversals.clear()
1297        if self.all_bursts.isChecked(): # User wants to see all configuration trails for all bursts in the set of bursts
1298            key = self.multi_automaton.matrix_to_string(nx.to_numpy_array(self.my_graph_m.graph))
1299            self.found_traversals = self.multi_automaton.states_plus_traversals[key][1]
1300            self.num_traversals_per_burst = self.multi_automaton.states_plus_traversals[key][2]
1301        else: # User selected a specific burst
1302            burst_index = int(self.burst.currentIndex())
1303            self.found_traversals = self.multi_automaton.call_find_all_travs_given_burst(self.multi_automaton.bursts_dicts[burst_index], self.my_graph_m)
1304            self.num_traversals_per_burst = None
1305        if self.found_traversals == []: # No configuration trails were found
1306            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1307            self.status_m = 3
1308            self.short_help_m.setText("Choose a burst or use all bursts in the set of bursts for finding paths")
1309            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
1310            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
1311            msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton paths found")
1312            msg.setText("With this burst(s), not all solitons can traverse the soliton graph successfully.")
1313            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Information)
1314            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
1315            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with different bursts.")
1316            x = msg.exec_()
1317        else: # Configuration trails were found and are now added to combobox
1318            self.incomplete_traversals_indices = []
1319            for t, traversal in enumerate(self.found_traversals):
1320                if isinstance(traversal, Traversal): # if traversal is a real traversal and no incomplete configuration trail were search was terminated
1321                    this_traversal = ""
1322                    for i, path in enumerate(traversal.traversal_for_user):
1323                        this_traversal = this_traversal + path
1324                        if i != len(traversal.traversal_for_user)-1:
1325                            this_traversal = this_traversal + ", "
1326                    self.traversals.addItem(this_traversal)
1327                else:
1328                    self.incomplete_traversals_indices.append(t)
1329            self.found_traversals = [i for j, i in enumerate(self.found_traversals) if j not in self.incomplete_traversals_indices]
1330            self.traversals_label.setText(f"Sets of paths ({len(self.found_traversals)}):") # Display right number of configuration trails
1331            self.show_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1332            self.status_m = 4
1333            self.short_help_m.setText("Select a set of paths and investigate it further")
1334            sep_index = 0
1335            if self.num_traversals_per_burst:
1336                for n, num in enumerate(self.num_traversals_per_burst): # add seperators to distinct which traversals resulted from which burst
1337                    if num != 0 and n != len(self.num_traversals_per_burst)-1: # don't add if there is no traversal for this burst of if it's the last burst
1338                        sep_index += num
1339                        self.traversals.insertSeparator(sep_index)
1340                        self.found_traversals.insert(sep_index, None) # so the indices in found_traversals correspond with the indices of the combobox items
1341                        self.incomplete_traversals_indices = [(index + 1) if (index >= sep_index) else index for index in self.incomplete_traversals_indices]
1342                        sep_index += 1 # indices got shifted by one because seperator was added
1343
1344
1345    def show_matrices_clicked(self):
1346        """Is called when user clicks button to have the adjacency matrices of every timestep in single soliton widget displayed.
1347        Makes a small window pop up that shows the labelled adjacency matrices and provides a save button.
1348        """
1349
1350        def save_matrices():
1351            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all adjacency matrices should be saved.
1352            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule and the soliton path.
1353            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1354            """
1355            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1356            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'matrices.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1357            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1358                path = name[0]
1359                file = open(path, "w")
1360                file.write(txt_text)
1361                file.close()
1362
1363        index = self.paths.currentIndex()
1364        desired_path = self.found_paths[index]
1365
1366        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1367        scrollArea = QScrollArea(dlg)
1368        scrollArea.setStyleSheet("font: 13pt Courier;")
1369        widget = QtWidgets.QWidget()
1370        vbox = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
1371        if re.search(',', self.my_graph.way) is not None:
1372            txt_text = f"Way to soliton graph: {self.my_graph.way} \n"
1373        else:
1374            txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.my_graph.way} \n"
1375        txt_text = txt_text + f"Soliton path: {desired_path.path_for_user} \n \n"
1376        # labelling of matrix depends on wether we have long node labels ("aa", "ab", ...) or short ones ("a", "b", ...)
1377        if (len(self.my_graph.labels) - len(self.my_graph.exterior_nodes)) > 26:
1378            matrix_label_horizontal = "    "
1379            long_labels = True
1380        else:
1381            matrix_label_horizontal = "   "
1382            long_labels = False
1383        for key in self.my_graph.labels:
1384            if long_labels:
1385                if self.my_graph.labels[key] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[key]) < 10:
1386                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]}  "
1387                else:
1388                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]} "
1389            else:
1390                if self.my_graph.labels[key] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[key]) >= 10:
1391                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]} "
1392                else:
1393                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph.labels[key]}  "
1394        # for show-matrices-window the node labels are added to the matrix string and this labelled matrix is added to scroll area
1395        # for matrices.txt we add everything (horizontal label and every row of matrix) line by line
1396        for i in range(len(desired_path.adjacency_matrices_list)):
1397            txt_text = txt_text + f"Timestep {i}: \n"
1398            txt_text = txt_text + f"{matrix_label_horizontal} \n"
1399            matrix_labelled = ""
1400            matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{matrix_label_horizontal}\n"
1401            matrix = str(desired_path.adjacency_matrices_list[i])
1402            matrix = re.sub(r"[matrix(]", "", matrix)
1403            matrix = re.sub(r"[)]", "", matrix)
1404            for j in range(len(matrix.splitlines())):
1405                if long_labels:
1406                    if self.my_graph.labels[j] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[j]) < 10:
1407                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1408                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1409                    else:
1410                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1411                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1412                else:
1413                    if self.my_graph.labels[j] in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph.labels[j]) >= 10:
1414                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1415                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1416                    else:
1417                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1418                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1419            txt_text = txt_text + f"\n"
1420            vbox.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(matrix_labelled))
1421        widget.setLayout(vbox)
1422        scrollArea.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1423        scrollArea.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1424        scrollArea.setWidgetResizable(True)
1425        scrollArea.setWidget(widget)
1426        scrollArea.setFixedSize(540, 405)
1427        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1428        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1429        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(454, 359, 70, 30))
1430        save_button.clicked.connect(save_matrices)
1431
1432        dlg.setWindowTitle("Adjacency Matrices")
1433        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1434        dlg.exec_()
1435
1436
1437    def show_matrices_clicked_m(self):
1438        """Is called when user clicks button to have the adjacency matrices of every timestep in multi soliton widget displayed.
1439        Makes a small window pop up that shows the labelled adjacency matrices and provides a save button.
1440        """
1441
1442        def save_matrices():
1443            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all adjacency matrices should be saved.
1444            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule and the soliton path.
1445            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1446            """
1447            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1448            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_mult, 'Save File', 'matrices.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1449            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1450                path = name[0]
1451                file = open(path, "w")
1452                file.write(txt_text)
1453                file.close()
1454
1455        index = self.traversals.currentIndex()
1456        desired_traversal = self.found_traversals[index]
1457
1458        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_mult)
1459        scrollArea = QScrollArea(dlg)
1460        scrollArea.setStyleSheet("font: 13pt Courier;")
1461        widget = QtWidgets.QWidget()
1462        vbox = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout()
1463        if re.search(',', self.my_graph_m.way) is not None:
1464            txt_text = f"Way to soliton graph: {self.my_graph_m.way} \n"
1465        else:
1466            txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.my_graph_m.way} \n"
1467        txt_text = txt_text + f"Set of bursts: {self.bursts} \n"
1468        this_traversal = ""
1469        for i, path in enumerate(desired_traversal.traversal_for_user):
1470            this_traversal = this_traversal + path
1471            if i != len(desired_traversal.traversal_for_user)-1:
1472                this_traversal = this_traversal + ", "
1473        txt_text = txt_text + f"Traversal: {this_traversal} \n \n"
1474        if (len(self.my_graph_m.labels) - len(self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes)) > 26:
1475            matrix_label_horizontal = "    "
1476            long_labels = True
1477        else:
1478            matrix_label_horizontal = "   "
1479            long_labels = False
1480        for key in self.my_graph_m.labels:
1481            if long_labels:
1482                if self.my_graph_m.labels[key] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[key]) < 10:
1483                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]}  "
1484                else:
1485                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]} "
1486            else:
1487                if self.my_graph_m.labels[key] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[key]) >= 10:
1488                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]} "
1489                else:
1490                    matrix_label_horizontal = matrix_label_horizontal + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[key]}  "
1491        for i in range(len(desired_traversal.adjacency_matrices_list)):
1492            txt_text = txt_text + f"Timestep {i}: \n"
1493            txt_text = txt_text + f"{matrix_label_horizontal} \n"
1494            matrix_labelled = ""
1495            matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{matrix_label_horizontal}\n"
1496            matrix = str(desired_traversal.adjacency_matrices_list[i])
1497            matrix = re.sub(r"[matrix(]", "", matrix)
1498            matrix = re.sub(r"[)]", "", matrix)
1499            for j in range(len(matrix.splitlines())):
1500                if long_labels:
1501                    if self.my_graph_m.labels[j] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[j]) < 10:
1502                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1503                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]} {matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1504                    else:
1505                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1506                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1507                else:
1508                    if self.my_graph_m.labels[j] in self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_reverse and int(self.my_graph_m.labels[j]) >= 10:
1509                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1510                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j][1:]} \n"
1511                    else:
1512                        matrix_labelled = matrix_labelled + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1513                        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.my_graph_m.labels[j]}{matrix.splitlines()[j]} \n"
1514            txt_text = txt_text + f"\n"
1515            vbox.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(matrix_labelled))
1516        widget.setLayout(vbox)
1517        scrollArea.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1518        scrollArea.setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy(QtCore.Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
1519        scrollArea.setWidgetResizable(True)
1520        scrollArea.setWidget(widget)
1521        scrollArea.setFixedSize(540, 405)
1522        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1523        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1524        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(454, 359, 70, 30))
1525        save_button.clicked.connect(save_matrices)
1526
1527        dlg.setWindowTitle("Adjacency Matrices")
1528        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1529        dlg.exec_()
1530    
1531
1532    def show_end_result_clicked(self):
1533        """Is called when user clicks button to have the resulting graph (after soliton path is traversed) in single soliton widget displayed.
1534        Makes a small window pop up that shows the graph visualisation and provides a save button.
1535        """
1536
1537        def save_end_result():
1538            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the resulting graph should be saved.
1539            Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1540            """
1541            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1542            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'result.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1543            if name != ('', ''):
1544                path = name[0]
1545                imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1546                result_pic.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1547                imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1548                file = open(path, "wb")
1549                file.write(imgByteArr)
1550                file.close()
1551
1552        def use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg: QDialog):
1553            """Uses the end result of the selected path as the new soliton graph. Puts the software in traversal mode.
1554
1555            Args:
1556                dlg (QDialog): The dialog window that shows the end result.
1557            """
1558            current_way = self.my_graph.way
1559            new_soliton_graph = copy.deepcopy(self.desired_path.resulting_soliton_graph)
1560            self.my_graph = new_soliton_graph
1561            self.my_graph.way = f"{current_way}, {self.desired_path.path_for_user}"
1562            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.my_graph.bindings, False, True)
1563            self.qim = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
1564            self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
1565
1566            self.traversal_mode.setChecked(True)
1567            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
1568            self.status = 2
1569            self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
1570            self.node_1.setCurrentIndex(0)
1571            self.node_2.setCurrentIndex(0)
1572            dlg.close()
1573
1574        index = self.paths.currentIndex()
1575        self.desired_path = self.found_paths[index]
1576        bindings_index = len(self.desired_path.path) - 1
1577        result_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.desired_path.bindings_list[bindings_index], False, True)
1578        qim = ImageQt(result_pic)
1579
1580        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1581        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1582        label.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 540, 405))
1583        label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim))
1584        label.setScaledContents(True)
1585        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1586        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1587        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(470, 375, 70, 30))
1588        save_button.clicked.connect(save_end_result)
1589        use_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Use", dlg)
1590        use_button.clicked.connect(lambda: use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg))
1591        use_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(395, 375, 70, 30))
1592
1593        dlg.setWindowTitle("End result")
1594        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1595        dlg.exec_()
1596
1597    
1598    def show_end_result_clicked_m(self):
1599        """Is called when user clicks button to have the resulting graph (after soliton path is traversed) in multi soliton widget displayed.
1600        Makes a small window pop up that shows the graph visualisation and provides a save button.
1601        """
1602
1603        def save_end_result():
1604            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the resulting graph should be saved.
1605            Only allows `.jpg`, `.png` and `.jpeg` file suffixes.
1606            """
1607            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1608            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_mult, 'Save File', 'result.jpg', 'Images (*.jpg *.png *.jpeg)', options = option)
1609            if name != ('', ''):
1610                path = name[0]
1611                imgByteArr = io.BytesIO()
1612                result_pic.save(imgByteArr, format='PNG')
1613                imgByteArr = imgByteArr.getvalue()
1614                file = open(path, "wb")
1615                file.write(imgByteArr)
1616                file.close()
1617
1618        def use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg: QDialog):
1619            """Uses the end result of the selected path as the new soliton graph. Puts the software in traversal mode.
1620
1621            Args:
1622                dlg (QDialog): The dialog window that shows the end result.
1623            """
1624            current_way = self.my_graph_m.way
1625            new_soliton_graph = copy.deepcopy(self.desired_traversal.resulting_soliton_graph)
1626            self.my_graph_m = new_soliton_graph
1627            self.my_graph_m.way = f"{current_way}, {self.desired_traversal.traversal_for_user}"
1628            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph_m, self.my_graph_m.bindings, False, True)
1629            self.qim_m = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
1630            self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
1631
1632            self.traversal_mode_m.setChecked(True)
1633            self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
1634            self.status_m = 3
1635            self.short_help_m.setText("Choose a burst or use all bursts in the set of bursts for finding paths")
1636            self.burst.setCurrentIndex(0)
1637            dlg.close()
1638
1639        index = self.traversals.currentIndex()
1640        self.desired_traversal = self.found_traversals[index]
1641        result_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.desired_traversal.resulting_soliton_graph, self.desired_traversal.resulting_soliton_graph.bindings, False, True)
1642        qim = ImageQt(result_pic)
1643
1644        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_mult)
1645        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1646        label.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 540, 405))
1647        label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim))
1648        label.setScaledContents(True)
1649        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1650        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1651        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(470, 375, 70, 30))
1652        save_button.clicked.connect(save_end_result)
1653        use_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Use", dlg)
1654        use_button.clicked.connect(lambda: use_as_new_soliton_graph(dlg))
1655        use_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(395, 375, 70, 30))
1656
1657        dlg.setWindowTitle("End result")
1658        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1659        dlg.exec_()
1660
1661
1662    def show_animation_clicked(self, button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1663        """Is called when user clicks button to have the animation of the soliton traversing the graph displayed.
1664        Makes a small window pop up that shows the animation and provides a "pause"/ "play" button, a "back" and a "forward" button and a save button.
1665        Instead of displaying the `gif` it uses a sequence of `PIL` images and always shows the next image after a certain time.
1666        Calls different animation functions depending on whether application is in single or multi soliton widget. 
1667
1668        Args:
1669            button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1670        """
1671
1672        def save_animation():
1673            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where the animation should be saved.
1674            Only allows `.gif` file suffix.
1675            """
1676            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1677            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(wid, 'Save File', 'animation.gif', 'Images (*.gif)', options = option)
1678            if name != ('', ''):
1679                path = name[0]
1680                if button == self.show_animation: # single soliton animation
1681                    ani = Animation.graph_animation(self.my_graph, self.desired_path)
1682                else: ani = Animation.graph_animation_multiwave(self.my_graph_m, self.desired_traversal) # multi soliton animation
1683                ani.save(path, writer='pillow', dpi = 600)
1684
1685        def update_image():
1686            """Displays next image of animation.
1687            """
1688            self.step += 1
1689            if button == self.show_animation: # Single soliton widget
1690                if self.step == len(self.desired_path.path): # start animation all over again as soon as end is reached (endless loop)
1691                    self.step = 0
1692            else: # Multi soliton widget
1693                if self.step == len(self.desired_traversal.pos):
1694                    self.step = 0
1695            im = self.pil_images[self.step]
1696            qim = ImageQt(im)
1697            self.label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim.copy()))
1698            self.label.setScaledContents(True)
1699
1700        def update_image_reverse():
1701            """Displays previous image of animation.
1702            """
1703            self.step -= 1
1704            if button == self.show_animation:
1705                if self.step == -1: # if start of animation was reached in the step before then continue at end of animation
1706                    self.step = len(self.desired_path.path) - 1
1707            else:
1708                if self.step == -1:
1709                    self.step = len(self.desired_traversal.pos) - 1
1710            im = self.pil_images[self.step]
1711            qim = ImageQt(im)
1712            self.label.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(qim.copy()))
1713            self.label.setScaledContents(True)
1714            
1715        def pause_animation(button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1716            """Is called when "pause"/ "play" button is pressed.
1717            Pauses/ plays animation by stopping the timer/ starting the timer.
1718
1719            Args:
1720                button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1721            """
1722            if self.timer.isActive(): # pause
1723                self.timer.stop()
1724                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1725                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1726                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1727            else: # play
1728                update_image()
1729                self.timer.start(800)  # triggers event every 800 millisecond
1730                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1731                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/pause.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1732                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/pause.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1733
1734        def next_img(button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1735            """Is called when "forward" button is pressed.
1736            Stops the timer if it is still active and calls `update_image` function.
1737
1738            Args:
1739                button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1740            """
1741            if self.timer.isActive():
1742                self.timer.stop()
1743                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1744                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1745                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1746            update_image()
1747
1748        def prev_img(button: QtWidgets.QPushButton):
1749            """Is called when "back" button is pressed.
1750            Stops the timer if it is still active and calls `update_image_reverse` function.
1751
1752            Args:
