1753                button (QtWidgets.QPushButton): Button that called the function (either button in single or in multi soliton widget).
1754            """
1755            if self.timer.isActive():
1756                self.timer.stop()
1757                if button.parentWidget().parentWidget() == self.wid_single:
1758                    button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1759                else: button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1760            update_image_reverse()
1761            
1762        if button == self.show_animation:
1763            dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1764        else: dlg = QDialog(self.wid_mult)
1765        self.label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1766        self.label.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 540, 405))
1767        
1768        if button == self.show_animation:
1769            wid = self.wid_single
1770        else:
1771            wid = self.wid_mult
1772        
1773        if button == self.show_animation:
1774            if self.path_index != self.paths.currentIndex():
1775                self.path_index = self.paths.currentIndex()
1776                self.desired_path = self.found_paths[self.path_index]
1777                plots_and_arrays = Animation.list_of_plots_and_arrays(self.my_graph, self.desired_path)
1778                self.pil_images = Animation.list_of_pil_images(plots_and_arrays)
1779        else:
1780            if self.traversal_index != self.traversals.currentIndex():
1781                self.traversal_index = self.traversals.currentIndex()
1782                self.desired_traversal = self.found_traversals[self.traversal_index]
1783                plots_and_arrays = Animation.list_of_plots_and_arrays_multiwave(self.my_graph_m, self.desired_traversal)
1784                self.pil_images = Animation.list_of_pil_images(plots_and_arrays)
1785
1786        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1787        save_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(470, 375, 70, 30))
1788        pause_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1789        pause_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(240, 375, 30, 30))
1790        pause_button.clicked.connect(lambda: pause_animation(pause_button))
1791        next_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1792        next_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(275, 375, 30, 30))
1793        next_button.clicked.connect(lambda: next_img(pause_button))
1794        prev_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1795        prev_button.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(205, 375, 30, 30))
1796        prev_button.clicked.connect(lambda: prev_img(pause_button))
1797        if button == self.show_animation:
1798            save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1799            save_button.clicked.connect(save_animation)
1800            pause_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1801            next_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/right-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1802            prev_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/left-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193)}")
1803        else:
1804            save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1805            save_button.clicked.connect(save_animation)
1806            pause_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/play.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1807            next_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/right-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1808            prev_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/left-arrow.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123)}")
1809
1810        self.step = -1
1811        self.timer = QtCore.QTimer(self)
1812        self.timer.timeout.connect(update_image) # timer calls `update_image` everytime event is triggered
1813        update_image()
1814
1815        dlg.setWindowTitle("Animation")
1816        dlg.setFixedSize(545, 410)
1817        dlg.closeEvent = self.stop_animation # stop timer when window is closed
1818        dlg.exec_()
1819
1820
1821    def stop_animation(self, event):
1822        """Stops the timer that is used for the animation.
1823        Without this method the application would crash if the animation window would get closed.
1824        Args:
1825            event: Close event of the window that shows animation.
1826        """
1827        self.timer.disconnect()
1828
1829
1830    def hide_retain_space(self, widgets: list):
1831        """Retains the space of widgets even when they are hidden.
1832
1833        Args:
1834            widgets (list): Widgets whose spaces should be retained.
1835        """
1836        for widget in widgets:
1837            retain = widget.sizePolicy()
1838            retain.setRetainSizeWhenHidden(True)
1839            widget.setSizePolicy(retain)
1840
1841
1842    def hide_multiple(self, widgets: list):
1843        """Hides multiple widgets at once, makes code a lot shorter because it unites several calls of the same function.
1844
1845        Args:
1846            widgets (list): Widgets who should be hidden.
1847        """
1848        for widget in widgets:
1849            widget.hide()
1850
1851
1852    def show_multiple(self, widgets: list):
1853        """Shows multiple widgets at once, makes code a lot shorter because it unites several calls of the same function.
1854
1855        Args:
1856            widgets (list): Widgets who should be showed.
1857        """
1858        for widget in widgets:
1859            widget.show()
1860
1861
1862    def heightForWidth(self, width: float):
1863        """Computes height for a given width.
1864
1865        Args:
1866            width (float): Given width.
1867
1868        Returns:
1869            float: Computed height.
1870        """
1871        height_for_width_factor = 1.0 * 519 / 688
1872        return math.ceil(width * height_for_width_factor)
1873
1874
1875    def widthForHeight(self, height):
1876        """Computes width for a given height.
1877
1878        Args:
1879            height (float): Given height.
1880
1881        Returns:
1882            float: Computed width.
1883        """
1884        width_for_height_factor = 1.0 * 688 / 519
1885        return math.ceil(height * width_for_height_factor)
1886
1887
1888    def resizeEvent(self, event: QtGui.QResizeEvent):
1889        """Keeps the right aspect ratio of the graph visualisation image (or welcoming screen in the beginning) when window is resized.
1890
1891        Args:
1892            event (QtGui.QResizeEvent): Resize event.
1893        """
1894        super(MainWindow, self).resizeEvent(event)
1895        size = event.size()
1896        # window height minus height of all widgets below the label result in height of pixmap
1897        height = size.height() - self.save.height() - self.submit_molecule.height() - self.submit_exterior_nodes.height() - self.paths.height() - self.show_animation.height()
1898        if self.widthForHeight(height) > size.width(): # pixmap width should be as most as big as width of whole window
1899            width = size.width()
1900        else:
1901            width = self.widthForHeight(height)
1902        self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(width, height, QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
1903        self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(width, height, QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))

Main Window of the GUI. Inherits from class QMainWindow.

MainWindow() 
 48    def __init__(self):
 49        """Initializes the main window.
 50        Main window contains a stacked layout with one window for single soliton case and one window for multi soliton case.
 51        Both display a welcoming text and all necessary widgets for the user to specify and submit a soliton graph.
 52        All other widgets are hidden for now and are revealed step by step, so user is guided through the use of the application.
 53        """
 54        super(MainWindow, self).__init__()
 55        self.setObjectName("MainWindow")
 56        # central widget is a stacked layout (so user can switch between the two different windows)
 57        self.central_wid = QtWidgets.QWidget()
 58        self.layout_for_wids = QtWidgets.QStackedLayout()
 59        self.central_wid.setStyleSheet("""background: white;""")
 60        # move window to the top of the screen + to the center horizontally
 61        qt_rectangle = self.frameGeometry()
 62        center_point = QtWidgets.QDesktopWidget().availableGeometry().center()
 63        qt_rectangle.moveCenter(center_point)
 64        self.move(qt_rectangle.topLeft().x(), 0)
 65        self.resize(QtCore.QSize(600, 680))
 66
 67
 68        # SOLITON AUTOMATON WIDGET
 69        self.wid_single = QtWidgets.QWidget()
 70        self.gridLayout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.wid_single)
 71        # Row 0:
 72        # Rectangle that displays the molecule
 73        self.display_molecule = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 74        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored)
 75        self.display_molecule.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
 76        self.display_molecule.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(50, 37))
 77        startscreen = Startscreen().image
 78        self.qim = ImageQt(startscreen)
 79        self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
 80        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.display_molecule, 0, 0, 2, 5, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter|QtCore.Qt.AlignVCenter)
 81        # Button that changes between the two windows
 82        self.change_window_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Switch Mode")
 83        self.change_window_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 20))
 84        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.change_window_button, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 85        self.change_window_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
 86        # "Mode" label
 87        self.mode = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
 88        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.mode, 0, 1, 1, 1)
 89        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 0
 90        self.row0 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
 91        self.minigrid0 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row0)
 92        self.minigrid0.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
 93        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row0, 0, 3, 1, 1)
 94        # Show Tips Checkbox
 95        self.show_tips = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Show Tips")
 96        self.show_tips.setChecked(True)
 97        self.minigrid0.addWidget(self.show_tips, 0, 0, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
 98        # Help button
 99        self.help_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton("?")
100        self.help_button.setFixedSize(QtCore.QSize(20, 20))
101        self.minigrid0.addWidget(self.help_button, 0, 1, 1, 1, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignRight)
102        self.help_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {border-radius: 10px;}")
103        # Row 1: - (Image of molecule in row 0 stretches over 2 lines)
104        # Row 2:
105        # Label that displays short help/ a tip in the current status of the UI
106        self.short_help = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
107        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
108        self.short_help.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
109        self.short_help.setStyleSheet("QLabel {color: rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
110        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.short_help, 2, 0, 1, 5, alignment=QtCore.Qt.AlignHCenter)
111        # Row 3:
112        # "Traversal Mode" Checkbox
113        self.traversal_mode = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("Traversal Mode")
114        self.traversal_mode.setChecked(False)
115        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.traversal_mode, 3, 0, 1, 1)
116        # Groupbox containg last two elements of row 2
117        self.row3 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
118        self.minigrid2 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row3)
119        self.minigrid2.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
120        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row3, 3, 3, 1, 1)
121        # Info button
122        self.mol_info = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
123        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
124        self.mol_info.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
125        self.mol_info.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
126        self.minigrid2.addWidget(self.mol_info, 3, 0, 1, 1)
127        # Save button for the molecule
128        self.save = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
129        self.save.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
130        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
131        self.save.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
132        self.save.setMaximumSize(QtCore.QSize(16777215, 32))
133        self.save.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
134        self.minigrid2.addWidget(self.save, 3, 1, 1, 1)
135        # Row 4:
136        # "Molecule" label
137        self.molecule_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
138        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.molecule_label, 4, 0, 1, 1)
139        # Groupbox containg middle two elements of row 3
140        self.row4 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
141        self.minigrid3 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row4)
142        self.minigrid3.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
143        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row4, 4, 1, 1, 2)
144        # Text field for molecule (combobox with a line edit)
145        self.molecule_lineedit = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row4)
146        try:
147            with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
148                data = json.load(json_file)
149        except:
150            pass
151        sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
152        for molecule in sorted_data: # Fill combobox with input strings from history
153            self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
154        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.row4)
155        self.molecule_lineedit.setLineEdit(edit)
156        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
157        self.molecule_lineedit.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
158        self.molecule_lineedit.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
159        self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().clear()
160        self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(191, 207, 255);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
161        self.minigrid3.addWidget(self.molecule_lineedit, 0, 0, 1, 1)
162        # Submit button for molecule
163        self.submit_molecule = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
164        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
165        self.submit_molecule.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
166        self.submit_molecule.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
167        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.submit_molecule, 4, 3, 1, 1)
168        # Parting line
169        self.parting_line1 = QHLine("single")
170        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.parting_line1, 5, 0, 1, 4)
171        # Row 5: 
172        # "Exterior nodes" label
173        self.exterior_nodes_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
174        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.exterior_nodes_label, 6, 0, 1, 1)
175        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 4
176        self.row5 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
177        self.minigrid4 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row5)
178        self.minigrid4.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
179        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row5, 6, 1, 1, 2)
180        # "All" Checkbox
181        self.all_exterior_nodes = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("All")
182        self.all_exterior_nodes.setChecked(False)
183        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.all_exterior_nodes, 6, 0, 1, 1)
184        # Combobox to choose first exterior node
185        self.node_1 = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5)
186        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
187        self.node_1.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
188        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.node_1, 6, 1, 1, 1)
189        # "&" label
190        self.exterior_nodes_label2 = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.row5)
191        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.exterior_nodes_label2, 6, 2, 1, 1)
192        # Combobox to choose second exterior node
193        self.node_2 = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5)
194        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
195        self.node_2.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
196        self.minigrid4.addWidget(self.node_2, 6, 3, 1, 1)
197        # Submit button for exterior nodes
198        self.submit_exterior_nodes = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
199        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
200        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
201        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
202        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.submit_exterior_nodes, 6, 3, 1, 1)
203        # Parting line
204        self.parting_line2 = QHLine("single")
205        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.parting_line2, 7, 0, 1, 4)
206        # Row 6:
207        # "Soliton paths" label
208        self.soliton_paths_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_single)
209        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.soliton_paths_label, 8, 0, 1, 1)
210        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 5
211        self.row6 = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
212        self.minigrid5 = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row6)
213        self.minigrid5.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
214        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
215        self.row6.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
216        self.row6.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
217        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.row6, 8, 1, 1, 3)
218        # Combobox to choose a soliton path
219        self.paths = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row6)
220        self.minigrid5.addWidget(self.paths, 8, 1, 1, 2)
221        # Row 7:
222        # "Show matrices" button
223        self.show_matrices = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
224        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
225        self.show_matrices.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
226        self.show_matrices.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
227        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_matrices, 9, 1, 1, 1)
228        # "Show end result" button
229        self.show_end_result = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
230        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
231        self.show_end_result.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
232        self.show_end_result.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
233        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_end_result, 9, 2, 1, 1)
234        # "Show animation" button
235        self.show_animation = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_single)
236        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
237        self.show_animation.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
238        self.show_animation.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
239        self.gridLayout.addWidget(self.show_animation, 9, 3, 1, 1)
240        # Menubar:

242        self.menubar.setGeometry(QtCore.QRect(0, 0, 564, 24))
243        self.setMenuBar(self.menubar)
244
245        # Function connections of different widgets:
246        self.change_window_button.clicked.connect(self.change_window)
247        self.show_tips.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.tips(self.show_tips))
248        self.traversal_mode.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.change_mode(self.traversal_mode))
249        self.mol_info.clicked.connect(self.mol_info_clicked)
250        self.save.clicked.connect(self.save_clicked)
251        self.help_button.clicked.connect(self.help_clicked)
252        self.submit_molecule.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked)
253        self.all_exterior_nodes.stateChanged.connect(self.all_exterior_nodes_statechanged)
254        self.submit_exterior_nodes.clicked.connect(self.submit_exterior_nodes_clicked)
255        self.show_matrices.clicked.connect(self.show_matrices_clicked)
256        self.show_end_result.clicked.connect(self.show_end_result_clicked)
257        self.show_animation.clicked.connect(lambda:self.show_animation_clicked(self.show_animation))
258        # Hide most widgets at the beginning (while retaining space) 
259        self.hide_retain_space([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
260        self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
261        # Stylesheet:
262        readme_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), '../styles.css')
263        with open(readme_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as fh:
264            self.style = fh.read()
265        self.wid_single.setStyleSheet(self.style)
266
267        self.status = 1 # What status the UI currently has (1: enter molecule, 2: choose exterior nodes, 3: investigate found paths)

276        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Ignored)

329        # Save button for the molecule

331        self.save_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
332        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
333        self.save_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
334        self.save_m.setMaximumSize(QtCore.QSize(16777215, 32))
335        self.save_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
336        self.minigrid2_m.addWidget(self.save_m, 3, 1, 1, 1)
337        # Row 4:
338        # "Molecule" label
339        self.molecule_label_m = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
340        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.molecule_label_m, 4, 0, 1, 1)
341        # Text field for molecule (combobox with a line edit)
342        self.molecule_lineedit_m = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.wid_mult)
343        try:
344            with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
345                data = json.load(json_file)
346        except:
347            pass
348        sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
349        for molecule in sorted_data:
350            self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
351        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.wid_mult)
352        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setLineEdit(edit)
353        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
354        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
355        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
356        self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().clear()
357        self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
358        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.molecule_lineedit_m, 4, 1, 1, 2)
359        # Submit button for molecule
360        self.submit_molecule_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
361        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
362        self.submit_molecule_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
363        self.submit_molecule_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
364        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_molecule_m, 4, 3, 1, 1)
365        # Parting line
366        self.parting_line1_m = QHLine("multi")
367        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line1_m, 5, 0, 1, 4)
368        # Row 5: 
369        # "Set of bursts" label
370        self.set_of_bursts_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
371        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.set_of_bursts_label, 6, 0, 1, 1)
372        # Groupbox containg middle two elements of row 4
373        self.row5_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
374        self.minigrid4_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row5_m)
375        self.minigrid4_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
376        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row5_m, 6, 1, 1, 2)
377        # Text field for set of bursts (combobox with a line edit)
378        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row5_m)
379        edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit(self.row5_m)
380        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setLineEdit(edit)
381        # Do those two things to prevent long molecules from resizing the whole window:
382        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setSizeAdjustPolicy(QtWidgets.QComboBox.AdjustToMinimumContentsLength)
383        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setMinimumContentsLength(1)
384        self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
385        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.set_of_bursts_lineedit, 0, 0, 1, 1)
386        # Submit button for set of bursts
387        self.submit_set_of_bursts = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
388        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
389        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
390        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
391        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_set_of_bursts, 6, 3, 1, 1)
392        # Parting line
393        self.parting_line2_m = QHLine("multi")
394        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line2_m, 7, 0, 1, 4)
395        # Row 6:
396        # "Bursts" label
397        self.bursts_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
398        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.bursts_label, 8, 0, 1, 1)
399        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 5
400        self.row6_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
401        self.minigrid4_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row6_m)
402        self.minigrid4_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
403        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row6_m, 8, 1, 1, 2)
404        # "All" checkbox
405        self.all_bursts = QtWidgets.QCheckBox("All")
406        self.all_bursts.setChecked(False)
407        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.all_bursts, 8, 0, 1, 1)
408        # Combobox to choose burst
409        self.burst = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row6_m)
410        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
411        self.burst.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
412        self.minigrid4_m.addWidget(self.burst, 8, 1, 1, 1)
413        # Submit button for burst
414        self.submit_burst = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
415        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.MinimumExpanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
416        self.submit_burst.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
417        self.submit_burst.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
418        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.submit_burst, 8, 3, 1, 1)
419        # Parting line
420        self.parting_line3_m = QHLine("multi")
421        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.parting_line3_m, 9, 0, 1, 4)
422        # Row 7:
423        # "Traversals" label
424        self.traversals_label = QtWidgets.QLabel(self.wid_mult)
425        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.traversals_label, 10, 0, 1, 1)
426        # Groupbox containg middle elements of row 6
427        self.row7_m = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
428        self.minigrid6_m = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(self.row7_m)
429        self.minigrid6_m.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
430        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
431        self.row7_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
432        self.row7_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
433        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.row7_m, 10, 1, 1, 3)
434        # Combobox to choose a traversal
435        self.traversals = QtWidgets.QComboBox(self.row7_m)
436        self.minigrid6_m.addWidget(self.traversals, 10, 1, 1, 2)
437        # Row 8:
438        # "Show matrices" button
439        self.show_matrices_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
440        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
441        self.show_matrices_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
442        self.show_matrices_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
443        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_matrices_m, 11, 1, 1, 1)
444        # "Show end result" button
445        self.show_end_result_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
446        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
447        self.show_end_result_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
448        self.show_end_result_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
449        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_end_result_m, 11, 2, 1, 1)
450        # "Show animation" button
451        self.show_animation_m = QtWidgets.QPushButton(self.wid_mult)
452        sizePolicy = QtWidgets.QSizePolicy(QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Expanding, QtWidgets.QSizePolicy.Fixed)
453        self.show_animation_m.setSizePolicy(sizePolicy)
454        self.show_animation_m.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
455        self.gridLayout_m.addWidget(self.show_animation_m, 11, 3, 1, 1)
456
457        # Function connections of different widgets:
458        self.change_window_button_m.clicked.connect(self.change_window)
459        self.show_tips_m.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.tips_m(self.show_tips_m))
460        self.traversal_mode_m.stateChanged.connect(lambda:self.change_mode_m(self.traversal_mode_m))
461        self.mol_info_m.clicked.connect(self.mol_info_clicked_m)
462        self.save_m.clicked.connect(self.save_clicked_m)
463        self.help_button_m.clicked.connect(self.help_clicked_m)
464        self.all_bursts.stateChanged.connect(self.all_bursts_statechanged)
465        self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked_m)
466        self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.connect(self.submit_set_of_bursts_clicked)
467        self.submit_burst.clicked.connect(self.submit_burst_clicked)
468        self.show_matrices_m.clicked.connect(self.show_matrices_clicked_m)
469        self.show_end_result_m.clicked.connect(self.show_end_result_clicked_m)
470        self.show_animation_m.clicked.connect(lambda:self.show_animation_clicked(self.show_animation_m))
471        # Hide most widgets at the beginning (while retaining space)
472        self.hide_retain_space([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
473        self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
474        # Stylesheet:
475        readme_path_m = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), '../styles_m.css')
476        with open(readme_path_m, "r", encoding="utf-8") as fh_m:
477            self.style_m = fh_m.read()
478        self.wid_mult.setStyleSheet(self.style_m)
479
480        self.status_m = 1 # What status the multiwave UI currently has (1: enter molecule, 2: enter burst, 3: choose burst(s), 4: investigate found paths)
481
482
483        # Add both widgets to stacked layout, default widget when starting the software is single soliton case widget
484        self.layout_for_wids.addWidget(self.wid_single)
485        self.layout_for_wids.addWidget(self.wid_mult)
486        self.central_wid.setLayout(self.layout_for_wids)
487        self.setCentralWidget(self.central_wid)
488        self.front_wid = 1
489        self.retranslateUi()
490        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(self)

Initializes the main window. Main window contains a stacked layout with one window for single soliton case and one window for multi soliton case. Both display a welcoming text and all necessary widgets for the user to specify and submit a soliton graph. All other widgets are hidden for now and are revealed step by step, so user is guided through the use of the application.

def retranslateUi(self): 
493    def retranslateUi(self):
494        """Implements multi-language suppport. Is generated automatically when using PyQt5 UI code generator.
495        """
496        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
497        self.setWindowTitle(_translate("MainWindow", "Soliton Automata Software"))
498        self.mode.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Single-Wave Mode"))
499        self.short_help.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu"))
500        self.mol_info.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Info"))
501        self.molecule_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Molecule:"))
502        self.submit_molecule.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose molecule"))
503        self.exterior_nodes_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Exterior nodes:"))
504        self.exterior_nodes_label2.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "&"))
505        self.submit_exterior_nodes.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose nodes"))
506        self.soliton_paths_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Soliton paths:"))
507        self.show_matrices.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show matrices"))
508        self.show_end_result.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show end result"))
509        self.show_animation.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show animation"))
510
511        self.mode_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Multi-Wave Mode"))
512        self.short_help_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu"))
513        self.mol_info_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Info"))
514        self.molecule_label_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Molecule:"))
515        self.submit_molecule_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose molecule"))
516        self.set_of_bursts_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Set of bursts:"))
517        self.submit_set_of_bursts.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Choose bursts"))
518        self.bursts_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Bursts:"))
519        self.submit_burst.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Select burst(s)"))
520        self.traversals_label.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Sets of paths:"))
521        self.show_matrices_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show matrices"))
522        self.show_end_result_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show end result"))
523        self.show_animation_m.setText(_translate("MainWindow", "Show animation"))

Implements multi-language suppport. Is generated automatically when using PyQt5 UI code generator.

def change_window(self): 
526    def change_window(self):
527        """Is called when "Change Mode" button is clicked. Changes between the two widgets of the stacked layout.
528        """
529        if self.front_wid == 1:
530            self.layout_for_wids.setCurrentIndex(1)
531            self.front_wid = 2
532        else:
533            self.layout_for_wids.setCurrentIndex(0)
534            self.front_wid = 1

Is called when "Change Mode" button is clicked. Changes between the two widgets of the stacked layout.

def change_mode(self, checkbox: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QCheckBox): 
537    def change_mode(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
538        """Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in single soliton widget.
539        In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph.
540        When in traversal mode, the input molecule can't be edited.
541
542        Args:
543            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.
544        """
545        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
546            # make text field uneditable and button unclickable, turn both objects grey to make those properties visually recognizable
547            self.submit_molecule.clicked.disconnect()
548            self.submit_molecule.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
549            self.molecule_lineedit.setEnabled(False)
550            self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
551            self.molecule_label.setText("Original molecule:")
552        else:
553            self.submit_molecule.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked)
554            self.submit_molecule.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
555            self.molecule_lineedit.setEnabled(True)
556            self.molecule_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(191, 207, 255);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
557            self.molecule_label.setText("Molecule:")
558            self.submit_molecule_clicked()

Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in single soliton widget. In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph. When in traversal mode, the input molecule can't be edited.

Args: checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.

def change_mode_m(self, checkbox: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QCheckBox): 
561    def change_mode_m(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
562        """Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in multi soliton widget.
563        In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph.
564        When in traversal mode, the input molecule and the set of bursts can't be edited.
565
566        Args:
567            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.
568        """
569        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
570            # make text field uneditable and button unclickable, turn both objects grey to make those properties visually recognizable
571            self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.disconnect()
572            self.submit_molecule_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
573            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setEnabled(False)
574            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
575            self.molecule_label_m.setText("Original molecule:")
576            self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.disconnect()
577            self.submit_set_of_bursts.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);}")
578            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setEnabled(False)
579            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(230, 230, 230);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
580        else:
581            self.submit_molecule_m.clicked.connect(self.submit_molecule_clicked_m)
582            self.submit_molecule_m.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
583            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setEnabled(True)
584            self.molecule_lineedit_m.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")
585            self.molecule_label_m.setText("Molecule:")
586            self.submit_molecule_clicked_m()
587            self.submit_set_of_bursts.clicked.connect(self.submit_set_of_bursts_clicked)
588            self.submit_set_of_bursts.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
589            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setEnabled(True)
590            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.setStyleSheet("QComboBox {border: 2px solid rgb(149, 221, 185);border-radius: 10px;padding: 0 8px;}")

Realizes the change between being in traversal mode and not being in traversal mode in multi soliton widget. In traversal mode, a soliton automaton can be traversed by using an end result as the new soliton graph. When in traversal mode, the input molecule and the set of bursts can't be edited.

Args: checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The checkbox that changes the mode.

def tips(self, checkbox: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QCheckBox): 
593    def tips(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
594        """Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in single soliton widget.
595
596        Args:
597            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox
598        """
599        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
600            self.short_help.show()
601        else:
602            self.hide_retain_space([self.short_help])
603            self.short_help.hide()

Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in single soliton widget.

Args: checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox

def tips_m(self, checkbox: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QCheckBox): 
606    def tips_m(self, checkbox: QtWidgets.QCheckBox):
607        """Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in multi soliton widget.
608
609        Args:
610            checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox
611        """
612        if checkbox.isChecked() == True:
613            self.short_help_m.show()
614        else:
615            self.hide_retain_space([self.short_help_m])
616            self.short_help_m.hide()

Realizes turning on/ off the displaying of tips/ short help in multi soliton widget.

Args: checkbox (QtWidgets.QCheckBox): The "Tips" Checkbox

def help_clicked(self): 
619    def help_clicked(self):
620        """Is called when "?" button is clicked in single soliton widget.
621        Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.
622        """
623        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
624        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
625        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
626        grid.addWidget(label, 0, 0, 1, 1)
627
628        if self.status == 1:
629            text = f"Please now enter a molecule behind \"Molecule: \"."
630            text = text + f"This is how you define one: \n"
631            text = text + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
632            text = text + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
633            text = text + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
634            text = text + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
635            text = text + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
636            text = text + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')\n\n"
637            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose molecule\"."
638            label.setText(text)
639        elif self.status == 2:
640            text = f"Please now choose exterior nodes. \n"
641            text = text + f"If you check \"All\", soliton paths between all pairs of the graph's exterior nodes are displayed. \n"
642            text = text + f"Alternatively, you can choose two exterior nodes. \n"
643            text = text + f"The software will then only give you paths between the first and the second exterior node. \n"
644            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose nodes\". \n\n"
645            text = text + f"You can also save the soliton graph with the save-button on the right. \n"
646            text = text + f"Determinism properties and possible impervious paths can be investigated by clicking on \"Info\"."
647            label.setText(text)
648        elif self.status == 3:
649            text = f"Please choose a soliton path from the drop-down menu. \n"
650            text = text + f"Each of the 3 buttons in the lower row will open a pop-up window with certain information. \n"
651            text = text + f"Clicking on \"Choose matrices\" will display the adjacency matrices of every timestep of the soliton's traversal. \n"
652            text = text + f"\"Show end result\" will show the resulting soliton graph after the traversal of the chosen path. \n"
653            text = text + f"In this window, you can click \"Use\", which will put the software in traversal mode. \n"
654            text = text + f"Traversal mode let's you use the resulting soliton graph as the new state of the soliton automaton. \n"
655            text = text + f"You will see that this mode locks the editing of the molecule textbox. \n"
656            text = text + f"It gives you the possibility to choose exterior nodes to then compute paths in this new state. \n"
657            text = text + f"By clicking \"Show animation\" an animation visualising the traversal of the chosen path will be played."
658            label.setText(text)
659
660        dlg.setWindowTitle("Help")
661        dlg.exec_()

Is called when "?" button is clicked in single soliton widget. Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.

def help_clicked_m(self): 
664    def help_clicked_m(self):
665        """Is called when "?" button is clicked in multi soliton widget.
666        Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.
667        """
668        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
669        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
670        label = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
671        grid.addWidget(label, 0, 0, 1, 1)
672
673        if self.status_m == 1:
674            text = f"Please now enter a molecule behind \"Molecule: \"."
675            text = text + f"This is how you define one: \n"
676            text = text + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
677            text = text + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
678            text = text + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
679            text = text + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
680            text = text + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
681            text = text + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')\n\n"
682            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose molecule\"."
683            label.setText(text)
684        elif self.status_m == 2:
685            text = f"Please now enter a set of bursts."
686            text = f"This is how you define one: \n"
687            text = text + f"- Starting and end node of a soliton are embedded in round brackets (e.g. (3, 2))\n"
688            text = text + f"- Solitons are seperated by '||'\n"
689            text = text + f"- The number in front of a soliton's pair of exterior nodes defines how many timesteps later than the previous soliton this soliton enters the graph\n"
690            text = text + f"- A set of bursts is embedded in braces, where individual bursts are seperated by ';'\n"
691            text = text + "- Example: " + "{(3,1)||1(1,2); (3,2)||4(2,1)}\n"
692            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Choose bursts\". \n\n"
693            text = text + f"You can also save the soliton graph with the save-button on the right."
694            label.setText(text)
695        elif self.status_m == 3:
696            text = f"Please now choose a burst. \n"
697            text = text + f"If you check \"All\", configuration trails for all bursts are displayed. \n"
698            text = text + f"Alternatively, you can choose a specific burst. \n"
699            text = text + "Submit by clicking \"Select burst(s)\". \n\n"
700            text = text + f"The soliton automaton's determinism properties can be investigated by clicking on \"Info\"."
701            label.setText(text)
702        elif self.status_m == 4:
703            text = f"Please choose a configuration trail from the drop-down menu. \n"
704            text = text + f"Configuration trails are displayed as a set of paths, where each path is marked with \"S\" and a number (e.g. \"S1\" for the first soliton). \n\n"
705            text = text + f"Each of the 3 buttons in the lower row will open a pop-up window with certain information. \n"
706            text = text + f"Clicking on \"Choose matrices\" will display the adjacency matrices of every timestep of the solitons' traversal. \n"
707            text = text + f"\"Show end result\" will show the resulting soliton graph after the traversal of the chosen configuration trail. \n"
708            text = text + f"In this window, you can click \"Use\", which will put the software in traversal mode. \n"
709            text = text + f"Traversal mode let's you use the resulting soliton graph as the new state of the soliton automaton. \n"
710            text = text + f"You will see that this mode locks the editing of the molecule and the set of bursts textboxes. \n"
711            text = text + f"It gives you the possibility to choose bursts from the entered set to then compute configuration trails in this new state. \n"
712            text = text + f"By clicking \"Show animation\" an animation visualising the traversal of the chosen configuration trail will be played."
713            label.setText(text)
714
715        dlg.setWindowTitle("Help")
716        dlg.exec_()

Is called when "?" button is clicked in multi soliton widget. Opens a window with some help regarding the next step(s) the user should do.

def submit_molecule_clicked(self): 
719    def submit_molecule_clicked(self):
720        """Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in single soliton widget.
721        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.
722        If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation,
723        an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to choose exterior nodes.
724        """
725        self.node_1.clear()
726        self.node_2.clear()
727        self.smiles_string = self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
728        try:
729            # Try creating a soliton graph out of the entered molecule. Fails if the syntax is wrong.
730            self.my_graph = SolitonGraph(self.smiles_string)
731            errors = self.my_graph.validate_soliton_graph()
732            self.automaton = SolitonAutomaton(self.my_graph)
733            self.graph_pic = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph, self.my_graph.bindings, False, True)
734            self.qim = ImageQt(self.graph_pic)
735            self.display_molecule.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim).scaled(self.display_molecule.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
736            if errors != []:
737                # Case in which the specified molecule is not a soliton graph. User will be provided with information which are the exact problems that make the molecule no soliton graph.
738                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
739                self.status = 1
740                self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
741                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
742                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px;}")
743                msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton graph")
744                msg.setText("You specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.")
745                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
746                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
747                msg.setInformativeText("See details for all incorrect parts of your molecule.")
748                details = ""
749                for i, error in enumerate(errors):
750                    if i == len(errors) - 1:
751                        details = details + f"- {error}"
752                    else:
753                        details = details + f"- {error}" + "\n"
754                msg.setDetailedText(details)
755                x = msg.exec_() # show messagebox
756            elif self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_name_collision() == True:
757                # Case in which two or more exterior nodes got assigned the same name.
758                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
759                self.status = 1
760                self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
761                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
762                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
763                msg.setWindowTitle("Name collision")
764                msg.setText("You specified two or more exterior nodes with the same name.")
765                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
766                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
767                x = msg.exec_()
768            else:
769                # Case in which a valid soliton graph was specified. User is now able to specify pair(s) of exterior nodes.
770                self.show_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes])
771                self.hide_multiple([self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
772                self.status = 2
773                self.short_help.setText("Choose a pair of exterior nodes or use all pairs for finding paths")
774                for key in self.my_graph.exterior_nodes_reverse:
775                    self.node_1.addItem(key)
776                    self.node_2.addItem(key)
777        except:
778            # No soliton graph could be created, so input syntax is wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
779            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode, self.row3, self.parting_line1, self.exterior_nodes_label, self.row5, self.submit_exterior_nodes, self.parting_line2, self.soliton_paths_label, self.paths, self.row6, self.show_matrices, self.show_end_result, self.show_animation])
780            self.status = 1
781            self.short_help.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
782            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_single)
783            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
784            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
785            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
786            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
787            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
788            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
789            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a molecule: \n"
790            details = details + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
791            details = details + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
792            details = details + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
793            details = details + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
794            details = details + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
795            details = details + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')"
796            msg.setDetailedText(details)
797            x = msg.exec_()
798        # Edit json file if input string was turned into a soliton graph successfully
799        if self.status == 2:
800            try:
801                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
802                    data = json.load(json_file)
803            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
804                data = []
805            
806            # Check if input string already exists in the data
807            existing_molecule = next((m for m in data if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string), None)
808            if existing_molecule:
809                existing_molecule["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") # If the molecule exists, update "last_used"
810            else: # If the molecule doesn't exist, add a new molecule
811                molecule = {
812                    "input_string": self.smiles_string,
813                    "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
814                    "sets_of_bursts": [
815                    ]
816                }
817                data.append(molecule)
818
819            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
820                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
821
822            # Change combobox items so that entered molecule (which is now the last used molecule) is the first element in the comboboxes of both windows
823            sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
824            self.molecule_lineedit.clear()
825            current_molecule_m = self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().text() # Save current text of line edit in multiwave window to add it again later
826            self.molecule_lineedit_m.clear()
827            for molecule in sorted_data:
828                self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
829                self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
830            self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().setText(current_molecule_m)

Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in single soliton widget. Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph. If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation, an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to choose exterior nodes.

def submit_molecule_clicked_m(self): 
833    def submit_molecule_clicked_m(self):
834        """Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in multi soliton widget.
835        Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.
836        If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation,
837        an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to specify a set of bursts and a stop number.
838        """
839        self.smiles_string_m = self.molecule_lineedit_m.lineEdit().text()
840        try:
841            # Try creating a soliton graph out of the entered molecule. Fails if the syntax is wrong.
842            self.my_graph_m = SolitonGraph(self.smiles_string_m)
843            errors = self.my_graph_m.validate_soliton_graph()
844            self.graph_pic_m = Visualisation.visualize_soliton_graph(self.my_graph_m, self.my_graph_m.bindings, False, True)
845            self.qim_m = ImageQt(self.graph_pic_m)
846            self.display_molecule_m.setPixmap(QtGui.QPixmap.fromImage(self.qim_m).scaled(self.display_molecule_m.size(), QtCore.Qt.KeepAspectRatio, QtCore.Qt.SmoothTransformation))
847            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
848            if errors != []:
849                # Case in which the specified molecule is not a soliton graph. User will be provided with information which are the exact problems that make the molecule no soliton graph.
850                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
851                self.status_m = 1
852                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
853                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
854                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
855                msg.setWindowTitle("No soliton graph")
856                msg.setText("You specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph.")
857                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
858                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
859                msg.setInformativeText("See details for all incorrect parts of your molecule.")
860                details = ""
861                for i, error in enumerate(errors):
862                    if i == len(errors) - 1:
863                        details = details + f"- {error}"
864                    else:
865                        details = details + f"- {error}" + "\n"
866                msg.setDetailedText(details)
867                x = msg.exec_() # show messagebox
868            elif self.my_graph_m.exterior_nodes_name_collision() == True:
869                # Case in which two or more exterior nodes got assigned the same name.
870                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.mol_info_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
871                self.status_m = 1
872                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
873                msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
874                msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
875                msg.setWindowTitle("Name collision")
876                msg.setText("You specified two or more exterior nodes with the same name.")
877                msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
878                msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
879                x = msg.exec_()
880            else:
881                # Case in which a valid soliton graph was specified. User is now able to specify a set of bursts.
882                self.show_multiple([self.save_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts])
883                self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
884                self.status_m = 2
885                self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a set of bursts or choose one from the drop-down menu")
886        except:
887            # No soliton graph could be created, so input syntax is wrong. A reminder is displayed, aiming to help the user to transform his input into an input with correct syntax.
888            self.hide_multiple([self.traversal_mode_m, self.save_m, self.parting_line1_m, self.mol_info_m, self.set_of_bursts_label, self.row5_m, self.submit_set_of_bursts, self.parting_line2_m, self.mol_info_m, self.bursts_label, self.row6_m, self.submit_burst, self.parting_line3_m, self.traversals_label, self.traversals, self.row7_m, self.show_matrices_m, self.show_end_result_m, self.show_animation_m])
889            self.status_m = 1
890            self.short_help_m.setText("Specify a molecule or choose one from the drop-down menu")
891            msg = QMessageBox(self.wid_mult)
892            msg.setStyleSheet(" QPushButton{ height: 32px; width: 130px}")
893            msg.setWindowTitle("Incorrect input")
894            msg.setText("The syntax of your input is not correct.")
895            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Warning)
896            msg.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox.Retry)
897            msg.setInformativeText("Please try again with another input string.")
898            details = f"Reminder - this is how you define a molecule: \n"
899            details = details + f"- Carbon atoms are marked with 'C' \n"
900            details = details + f"- Single bonds are marked with '-' or no character at all \n"
901            details = details + f"- Double bonds are marked with '=' \n"
902            details = details + f"- Branches are embedded in round brackets (e.g. 'C(=CC=C)C')\n"
903            details = details + f"- The two connecting atoms of a ring are marked with the same number (e.g. 'C1' and 'C1') \n"
904            details = details + "- Exterior nodes are marked with braces and a number (e.g. '{=1}')"
905            msg.setDetailedText(details)
906            x = msg.exec_()
907        # Edit json file if input string was turned into a soliton graph successfully
908        if self.status_m == 2:
909            try:
910                with open("data.json", "r") as json_file:
911                    data = json.load(json_file)
912            except (FileNotFoundError, JSONDecodeError):
913                data = []
914            
915            # Check if input string already exists in the data
916            existing_molecule = next((m for m in data if m.get("input_string") == self.smiles_string_m), None)
917            if existing_molecule:
918                existing_molecule["last_used"] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") # If the molecule exists, update "last_used"
919            else: # If the molecule doesn't exist, add a new molecule
920                molecule = {
921                    "input_string": self.smiles_string_m,
922                    "last_used": datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
923                    "sets_of_bursts": [
924                    ]
925                }
926                existing_molecule = molecule
927                data.append(molecule)
928
929            with open("data.json", "w") as json_file:
930                json.dump(data, json_file, indent=4)
931
932            # Change combobox items so that entered molecule (which is now the last used molecule) is the first element in the comboboxes of both windows
933            sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
934            self.molecule_lineedit_m.clear()
935            current_molecule = self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().text()
936            self.molecule_lineedit.clear()
937            for molecule in sorted_data:
938                self.molecule_lineedit_m.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
939                self.molecule_lineedit.addItem(molecule["input_string"])
940            self.molecule_lineedit.lineEdit().setText(current_molecule)
941
942            # Add all set of bursts from history of the current molecule
943            sorted_burstsets = sorted(existing_molecule["sets_of_bursts"], key=lambda x: x["last_used"], reverse=True)
944            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.clear()
945            for burstset in sorted_burstsets:
946                self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.addItem(burstset["set_of_bursts"])
947            self.set_of_bursts_lineedit.lineEdit().clear()

Is called when user clicks button to submit the specified molecule in multi soliton widget. Catches errors if user used the wrong syntax or specified a molecule that does not fulfill the requirements of a soliton graph. If the user's molecule is valid it displays the graph of the molecule. It then also reveals a save button for the graph visualisation, an info button and all the necessary widgets for the user to specify a set of bursts and a stop number.

def mol_info_clicked(self): 
 950    def mol_info_clicked(self):
 951        """Is called when "Info" button in single soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether
 952        the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic and reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism and all impervious paths.
 953        """
 954
 955        def save_info():
 956            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all info on soliton automaton/ soliton graph should be saved.
 957            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule.
 958            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
 959            """
 960            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
 961            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'info.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
 962            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
 963                path = name[0]
 964                file = open(path, "w")
 965                file.write(txt_text)
 966                file.close()
 967        
 968        txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.smiles_string} \n\n"
 969        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
 970        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
 971        # Deterministic
 972        label_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 973        label_det.setText("Deterministic:")
 974        txt_text = txt_text + f"Deterministic: "
 975        grid.addWidget(label_det, 0, 0, 1, 1)
 976        det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 977        if self.automaton.deterministic:
 978            det_bool.setText("Yes")
 979            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
 980        else: 
 981            det_bool.setText("No")
 982            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
 983        grid.addWidget(det_bool, 0, 1, 1, 1)
 984        # Strongly deterministic
 985        label_strong_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 986        label_strong_det.setText("Strongly deterministic:")
 987        txt_text = txt_text + f"Strongly deterministic: "
 988        grid.addWidget(label_strong_det, 1, 0, 1, 1)
 989        strong_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 990        if self.automaton.strongly_deterministic:
 991            strong_det_bool.setText("Yes")
 992            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
 993        else: 
 994            strong_det_bool.setText("No")
 995            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
 996        grid.addWidget(strong_det_bool, 1, 1, 1, 1)
 997        # Reachability-deterministic
 998        label_reach_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
 999        label_reach_det.setText("Reachability-deterministic:")
1000        txt_text = txt_text + f"Reachability-deterministic: "
1001        grid.addWidget(label_reach_det, 2, 0, 1, 1)
1002        reach_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1003        if self.automaton.reachability_deterministic:
1004            reach_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1005            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1006        else: 
1007            reach_det_bool.setText("No")
1008            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1009        grid.addWidget(reach_det_bool, 2, 1, 1, 1)
1010        # Degree of non-determinism
1011        label_degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1012        label_degree.setText("Degree of non-determinism:")
1013        txt_text = txt_text + f"Degree of non-determinism: "
1014        grid.addWidget(label_degree, 3, 0, 1, 1)
1015        degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1016        degree.setText(str(self.automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism))
1017        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism} \n"
1018        grid.addWidget(degree, 3, 1, 1, 1)
1019        # Impervious paths
1020        label_imp_paths = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1021        label_imp_paths.setText("Impervious path(s):")
1022        txt_text = txt_text + f"Impervious path(s): "
1023        grid.addWidget(label_imp_paths, 4, 0, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1024        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1025        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(191, 207, 255); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(132, 145, 193);}")
1026        save_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
1027        grid.addWidget(save_button, 5, 1, 1, 1)
1028        save_button.clicked.connect(save_info)
1029        group = QtWidgets.QGroupBox()
1030        layout = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(group)
1031        layout.setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0)
1032        impervs = self.automaton.find_impervious_paths()
1033        if impervs == []:
1034            layout.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel("-"))
1035            txt_text = txt_text + f"-"
1036        for i, path in enumerate(impervs):
1037            layout.addWidget(QtWidgets.QLabel(path), i, 0, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1038            txt_text = txt_text + f"{path}"
1039            if i != len(impervs)-1:
1040                txt_text = txt_text + f", "
1041        grid.addWidget(group, 4, 1, 1, 1, alignment = QtCore.Qt.AlignTop)
1042        dlg.setWindowTitle("Info")
1043        dlg.exec_()

Is called when "Info" button in single soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic and reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism and all impervious paths.

def mol_info_clicked_m(self): 
1046    def mol_info_clicked_m(self):
1047        """Is called when "Info" button in multi soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether
1048        the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic, reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism.
1049        """
1050
1051        def save_info():
1052            """Opens a file dialog in which user can specify a path where a text file with all info on soliton automaton/ soliton graph should be saved.
1053            Text file also contains the input string representing the molecule.
1054            Only allows `.txt` file suffix.
1055            """
1056            option = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.Options()
1057            name = QtWidgets.QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(self.wid_single, 'Save File', 'info.txt', 'Text files (*.txt)', options = option)
1058            if name != ('', ''): # only do the following if user clicked on save button (without this line the application closes with an error if save action is cancelled)
1059                path = name[0]
1060                file = open(path, "w")
1061                file.write(txt_text)
1062                file.close()
1063        
1064        dlg = QDialog(self.wid_single)
1065        grid = QtWidgets.QGridLayout(dlg)
1066        label_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1067        txt_text = f"Soliton graph: {self.smiles_string_m} \n"
1068        txt_text = txt_text + f"Set of bursts: {self.bursts} \n\n"
1069        label_det.setText("Deterministic:")
1070        txt_text = txt_text + f"Deterministic: "
1071        grid.addWidget(label_det, 0, 0, 1, 1)
1072        det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1073        if self.multi_automaton.deterministic:
1074            det_bool.setText("Yes")
1075            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1076        else: 
1077            det_bool.setText("No")
1078            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1079        grid.addWidget(det_bool, 0, 1, 1, 1)
1080        label_strong_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1081        label_strong_det.setText("Strongly deterministic:")
1082        txt_text = txt_text + f"Strongly deterministic: "
1083        grid.addWidget(label_strong_det, 1, 0, 1, 1)
1084        strong_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1085        if self.multi_automaton.strongly_deterministic:
1086            strong_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1087            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1088        else: 
1089            strong_det_bool.setText("No")
1090            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1091        grid.addWidget(strong_det_bool, 1, 1, 1, 1)
1092
1093        label_reach_det = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1094        label_reach_det.setText("Reachability-deterministic:")
1095        txt_text = txt_text + f"Reachability-deterministic: "
1096        grid.addWidget(label_reach_det, 2, 0, 1, 1)
1097        reach_det_bool = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1098        if self.multi_automaton.reachability_deterministic:
1099            reach_det_bool.setText("Yes")
1100            txt_text = txt_text + f"Yes \n"
1101        else: 
1102            reach_det_bool.setText("No")
1103            txt_text = txt_text + f"No \n"
1104        grid.addWidget(reach_det_bool, 2, 1, 1, 1)
1105
1106        label_degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1107        label_degree.setText("Degree of non-determinism:")
1108        txt_text = txt_text + f"Degree of non-determinism: "
1109        grid.addWidget(label_degree, 3, 0, 1, 1)
1110        degree = QtWidgets.QLabel(dlg)
1111        degree.setText(str(self.multi_automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism))
1112        txt_text = txt_text + f"{self.multi_automaton.degree_of_nondeterminism} \n"
1113        grid.addWidget(degree, 3, 1, 1, 1)
1114
1115        save_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton(dlg)
1116        save_button.setStyleSheet("QPushButton {background-color: rgb(149, 221, 185); image: url(:/icons/save.svg);} QPushButton::pressed {background-color : rgb(90, 159, 123);}")
1117        save_button.setMinimumSize(QtCore.QSize(0, 32))
1118        grid.addWidget(save_button, 4, 1, 1, 1)
1119        save_button.clicked.connect(save_info)
1120        dlg.setWindowTitle("Info")
1121        dlg.exec_()

Is called when "Info" button in multi soliton widget is clicked. Opens a dialog window showing whether the automaton is deterministic, strongly deterministic, reachability-deterministic and displaying the degree of non-determinism.

def save_clicked(self): 
1124    def save_clicked(self):
